fields.name: Aero Stainless Frypan
fields.name_description: A versatile stainless-steel frypan with a triple-layer base for even heat — designed for daily searing and sautéing with easy-release finish.
fields.description: Aero Stainless Frypan features a heavy-gauge base with three bonded layers to distribute heat evenly across the surface. The polished cooking surface resists sticking and the riveted handle stays cool while providing a secure grip for tossing and flipping ingredients.

fields.name: Baker Ceramic Roasting Tray
fields.name_description: A glazed ceramic roasting tray with non-porous finish — ideal for even roasting and oven-to-table presentation.
fields.description: Baker Ceramic Roasting Tray is glazed to resist staining and thermal shock, providing consistent oven performance and a smooth surface for easy cleaning. Its generous depth accommodates vegetables and joints while retaining moisture for tender results.

fields.name: Castwell Enamel Casserole
fields.name_description: An enameled cast-iron casserole with tight-fitting lid — built for slow-cooking stews and retaining heat reliably.
fields.description: Castwell Enamel Casserole combines heavy cast-iron heat retention with an easy-clean enamel interior. The snug lid seals moisture for slow braises and the wide base encourages even caramelisation before simmering.
fields.metal: Cast iron with enamel coating — heavy heat retention

fields.name: Delta Nonstick Sauté Pan
fields.name_description: A nonstick sauté pan with sloped sides and long handle — crafted for quick frying and easy food release.
fields.description: Delta Nonstick Sauté Pan features a durable hard-anodised body for fast, even heating and a PFOA-free nonstick surface for effortless turning and cleaning. The ergonomic handle provides balance during agile stovetop work.

fields.name: EcoSteel Saucepot
fields.name_description: A medium saucepot with measurement markings and tempered glass lid — suited for sauces, grains and small-batch boiling.
fields.description: EcoSteel Saucepot is built from corrosion-resistant stainless steel with an encapsulated base for uniform heat. Internal liter markings and a vented glass lid help control simmering while allowing visual monitoring without lifting the lid.

fields.name: Fusion Oven Tray Set
fields.name_description: A set of perforated and solid oven trays with non-stick coating — designed for roasting, baking and crisping with airflow control.
fields.description: Fusion Oven Tray Set includes complementary tray profiles to optimise airflow and roasting results. The non-stick finish reduces residue build-up and the reinforced rims keep trays flat under heavy loads for consistent baking and roasting.

fields.name: GrindPro Mortar & Pestle
fields.name_description: A heavy stone mortar and pestle set with textured bowl — built to grind spices and pastes by hand for maximum flavour release.
fields.description: GrindPro Mortar & Pestle is carved from dense granite with a roughened interior to break down seeds and herbs quickly. The solid pestle fits comfortably in hand and the weight of the bowl stabilises grinding for coarse or fine pastes.

fields.name: Hearth Cast Skillet
fields.name_description: A seasoned cast-iron skillet with curved sides — ideal for high-heat searing and oven finishing for a crisp crust.
fields.description: Hearth Cast Skillet is pre-seasoned to develop a natural non-stick patina with use. The robust construction holds heat for consistent searing while the flared rim and integrated pour spouts ease serving and draining excess fats.

fields.name: Infuse Oil Dispenser
fields.name_description: A slim glass oil dispenser with drip-free spout and measuring cap — designed for controlled pouring and stylish countertop display.
fields.description: Infuse Oil Dispenser uses a clear tempered glass bottle and a precision spout to prevent drips while pouring. The removable cap doubles as a measuring cup and the slim profile fits into refrigerator doors and tight pantry spaces.
fields.metal: Tempered glass & stainless spout — leak-resistant combo

fields.name: Junction Stainless Steamer
fields.name_description: A two-tier stainless steamer insert with folding handles — made for gentle steaming of vegetables, fish and dumplings.
fields.description: Junction Stainless Steamer stacks easily into pots to create steaming levels without occupying additional cookware. The perforated tiers allow circulating steam while the foldable handles lift both tiers safely for quick serving.

fields.name: KitchPro Tongs Set
fields.name_description: A set of locking tongs with silicone tips — intended for safe flipping, serving and stovetop-to-oven use without scratching cookware.
fields.description: KitchPro Tongs Set includes two lengths to handle both delicate plating and high-heat grilling. The silicone tips protect nonstick and enamel surfaces while the locking mechanism enables compact storage between uses.

fields.name: LadleMaster Soup Ladle
fields.name_description: A deep-bodied serving ladle with long handle and pour spout — crafted for neat, controlled portioning of soups and sauces.
fields.description: LadleMaster Soup Ladle offers a generous bowl and angled lip to direct liquids cleanly into bowls or pans. The elongated handle keeps hands away from steam while the hanging loop stores conveniently on racks.

fields.name: Mason Kitchen Knife Set
fields.name_description: A three-piece chef's knife set with precision-forged blades and ergonomic handles — intended for everyday chopping and prep tasks.
fields.description: Mason Kitchen Knife Set features heat-treated blades for edge retention and contoured handles for balanced control. Each knife is honed to a fine edge and includes a protective sheath to maintain sharpness between uses.
fields.size: Chef 20 cm / Utility 14 cm / Paring 9 cm

fields.name: Nimble Silicone Spatula Trio
fields.name_description: A trio of flexible silicone spatulas with heat-resistant cores — made for folding, scraping and glazing without damaging pans.
fields.description: Nimble Silicone Spatula Trio includes small, medium and large heads designed for precise folding and full-bowl scraping. The heat-resistant silicone defends against stovetop temperatures while the solid core provides stability under pressure.
fields.metal: Silicone with nylon core — heat-resistant flexible

fields.name: Orbit Baking Dish
fields.name_description: A tempered glass baking dish with wide rim and oven-safe rating — suitable for casseroles, lasagna and gratins.
fields.description: Orbit Baking Dish withstands oven temperatures and delivers transparent roasting visibility for even browning. The smooth interior resists sticking when greased and the reinforced edges reduce risk of chipping during handling.

fields.name: Panache Whisk Set
fields.name_description: A set of balloon and flat whisks with welded handles — crafted for foaming, emulsifying and batter mixing with minimal fatigue.
fields.description: Panache Whisk Set includes a large balloon whisk for aeration and a flat whisk for pan sauces. The ergonomically designed handles ensure comfortable grip while the polished wires resist bending under heavy use.
fields.metal: Stainless steel wires & handle — welded construction

fields.name: Quench Salad Spinner
fields.name_description: A compact salad spinner with braking mechanism and non-slip base — designed for fast drying of greens and herbs.
fields.description: Quench Salad Spinner removes water efficiently using a smooth-rolling pulley and brake button to stop the basket instantly. The inner basket is perforated for rapid drainage and the lid seals to prevent splatter during operation.
fields.metal: BPA-free plastic & stainless axle — safe spinning

fields.name: Rivet Stainless Steamer Pot
fields.name_description: A multi-purpose pot with steamer insert and steam-release lid — ideal for rice, dumplings and gentle cooking.
fields.description: Rivet Stainless Steamer Pot includes a deep base for boiling and a fitted perforated insert for steaming. The heavy base prevents hotspots while the venting lid regulates condensation for fluffy rice and evenly steamed vegetables.

fields.name: SearPro Grill Pan
fields.name_description: A ridged grill pan with nonstick coating and heavy base — created to deliver stovetop grill marks and charred flavour.
fields.description: SearPro Grill Pan provides pronounced ridges to lift food away from fat and create grill marks. The heavy gauge heats evenly and the nonstick surface simplifies cleaning while allowing high-heat searing for vegetables and proteins.
fields.metal: Cast aluminium with nonstick — ridged surface

fields.name: Tenderboard Bamboo Chopping
fields.name_description: A reversible bamboo chopping board with juice groove and non-slip feet — suitable for heavy prep and serving.
fields.description: Tenderboard Bamboo Chopping board is crafted from dense bamboo strips for durability and gentle knife impact. The juice groove on one side captures liquids while the flat face serves as a convenient presentation surface for cheeses and breads.

fields.name: UltraMix Measuring Cups
fields.name_description: A nested measuring cup set with engraved markings and pouring spouts — designed for precise dry and wet measurement.
fields.description: UltraMix Measuring Cups are marked with metric and imperial units for versatile recipe use and the nested design saves cupboard space. The spouted edges allow spill-free pouring while the sturdy mould maintains accuracy over time.

fields.name: Vero Silicone Baking Mat
fields.name_description: A reusable silicone baking mat with non-slip backing — perfect for even heat distribution and reducing waste from parchment paper.
fields.description: Vero Silicone Baking Mat provides a non-stick surface that promotes even browning and easy cleanup. The textured weave helps airflow below baked goods and the mat withstands repeated high-temperature oven cycles.

fields.name: Whittle Peeler Duo
fields.name_description: A dual-blade peeler with swivel head and ergonomic grip — designed for efficient peeling of vegetables and fruits.
fields.description: Whittle Peeler Duo offers both straight and julienne blades for versatile prep while the swivel head follows contours for minimal waste. The comfortable handle reduces wrist strain and the removable blade makes cleaning simple.

fields.name: Xpress Rice Cooker Insert
fields.name_description: A non-stick rice cooker inner pot with tight-fitting lid — engineered to produce fluffy rice and easy cleaning.
fields.description: Xpress Rice Cooker Insert is coated with a durable non-stick layer for effortless release and cleaning. The pot is dimensioned to fit common rice cookers and withstands repeated heating cycles without warping.

fields.name: Yonder Colander Bowl
fields.name_description: A stainless colander with reinforced base and large perforations — made for quick draining and rinsing of pasta and produce.
fields.description: Yonder Colander Bowl stands on a stable base to free hands for tossing and draining while the large perforations speed water egress. The rolled rim adds grip and strength, making it suitable for heavy loads of pasta or vegetables.

fields.name: Zeal Measuring Spoon Set
fields.name_description: A stackable stainless measuring spoon set with magnetic handles — for accurate spoon measurements and tidy storage.
fields.description: Zeal Measuring Spoon Set features engraved metric and imperial marks and a magnetic handle system to keep spoons aligned. The compact nesting design simplifies drawer organisation while ensuring precise portioning for recipes.

fields.name: Alpen Pressure Cooker
fields.name_description: A high-safety pressure cooker with multi-lock lid and pressure indicator — engineered for rapid, energy-efficient cooking.
fields.description: Alpen Pressure Cooker includes a secure multi-lock lid, pressure regulator and gasket for dependable operation. The thick base minimises scorching while fast pressure cycles reduce cooking time for legumes, grains and stews.
fields.metal: Stainless steel body & lid — safety valve

fields.name: Bento Lunch Box Set
fields.name_description: A compartmentalised stainless lunch box set with leakproof seals — suited for portioned meals and easy transport.
fields.description: Bento Lunch Box Set features secure snap lids and silicone seals to keep compartments separate and prevent leakage. The stainless compartments resist staining and the compact case fits easily into backpacks or work bags.

fields.name: Cerami Nonstick Wok
fields.name_description: A deep ceramic-coated wok with helper handle and wide base — built for stir-frying and high-heat tossing.
fields.description: Cerami Nonstick Wok's ceramic surface promotes fast, even frying while resisting food adhesion. The generous bowl shape allows rapid movement of ingredients and the helper handle adds leverage when lifting heavy dishes.

fields.name: Droplet Basting Brush
fields.name_description: A silicone basting brush with heat-resistant bristles and ergonomic handle — for glazing, basting and oiling pans.
fields.description: Droplet Basting Brush features densely packed silicone bristles that hold glazes and sauces while remaining easy to clean. The long handle keeps hands away from hot grills and ovens and the hanging loop allows easy storage.

fields.name: Evoke Thermo Carafe
fields.name_description: A double-walled thermal carafe with twist-lock lid — designed to keep liquids hot or cold for hours.
fields.description: Evoke Thermo Carafe uses vacuum insulation to preserve beverage temperature and a leakproof twist lid for spill-free pouring. The polished exterior is easy to grip and the wide mouth simplifies refilling and cleaning.

fields.name: Feast Stainless Steamer Basket
fields.name_description: A collapsible stainless steamer basket with centre post — useful for steaming small portions and easy storage.
fields.description: Feast Steamer Basket expands to fit different pot sizes and collapses flat for compact storage. The perforated panels allow steam to circulate evenly and the central post anchors the basket for stable lifting.

fields.name: Glide Pasta Server
fields.name_description: A deep pasta server with forked edges and draining holes — designed for efficient serving and draining of long pasta.
fields.description: Glide Pasta Server's pronged bowl lifts portions of spaghetti and other long pasta while integrated holes drain water quickly. The comfortable handle provides leverage and the hanging loop supports tidy storage.

fields.name: Harvest Silicone Steam Lid
fields.name_description: A universal silicone lid with steam vents and flexible rim — made to convert pots into steamers and minimize splatter.
fields.description: Harvest Silicone Steam Lid fits a range of pot diameters and releases excess steam through built-in vents to reduce boil-overs. The soft rim creates a tight seal and the lid collapses for compact storage when not in use.

fields.name: Inox Cheese Grater
fields.name_description: A four-side stainless grater with anti-slip base and handle — ideal for grating cheese, zesting citrus and shredding vegetables.
fields.description: Inox Cheese Grater includes fine, medium, coarse and slicing surfaces to handle a variety of tasks. The ergonomic handle and rubber base provide stability while grating and the large chassis collects shreds cleanly.

fields.name: Joule Silicone Steamer Basket
fields.name_description: A foldable silicone steamer basket with raised feet — crafted for delicate steaming and compact storage.
fields.description: Joule Silicone Steamer Basket collapses for small storage spaces and expands to create a shallow steaming platform. The raised feet lift food above simmering water and the silicone construction is dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

fields.name: Keen Rolling Pin
fields.name_description: A solid beechwood rolling pin with tapered ends — engineered for even dough rolling and dependable weight distribution.
fields.description: Keen Rolling Pin is turned from dense beech for a smooth, non-stick rolling surface that responds well to flouring. The tapered ends enable delicate pressure control and the pin's balanced weight flattens dough uniformly for pastry and pasta.

fields.name: LadlePro Skimming Spoon
fields.name_description: A shallow skimmer spoon with perforations and long handle — created for skimming fats and lifting fried items cleanly.
fields.description: LadlePro Skimming Spoon's fine perforations allow oil and liquid to drain quickly while the wide surface supports larger pieces when lifting. The extended handle keeps hands clear of heat and the spoon is dishwasher-safe for convenience.

fields.name: Mingle Mixing Bowl Set
fields.name_description: A nested stainless mixing bowl set with non-slip bases and pouring spouts — designed for mixing, whisking and serving.
fields.description: Mingle Mixing Bowl Set nests for compact storage and features textured non-slip bases to keep bowls stable during vigorous mixing. Each bowl includes a pouring spout to transfer batters and sauces without drips.

fields.name: Nova Silicone Oven Mitts
fields.name_description: A pair of long silicone oven mitts with heat-proof lining and textured grip — supplied for safe handling of hot cookware.
fields.description: Nova Silicone Oven Mitts provide full forearm protection with a textured surface to prevent slipping when lifting trays and pans. The heat-proof lining adds comfort while the mitts are easy to wipe clean after use.

fields.name: Aster Ceramic Vase
fields.name_description: A hand-glazed ceramic vase with subtle ribbing — designed to display single stems or small bouquets on consoles and dining tables.
fields.description: Aster Ceramic Vase is wheel-thrown and finished with a resilient glaze that resists staining. The tapered neck supports flower stems while the weighted base ensures stability when used with water and foliage.

fields.name: Bramwell Table Lamp
fields.name_description: A mid-century table lamp with fabric shade and brass details — intended to create warm ambient lighting in living rooms and bedrooms.
fields.short_description: Fabric shade table lamp with brass base
fields.description: Bramwell Table Lamp pairs a soft-textured shade with a low-profile base to diffuse light evenly. The integrated switch sits on the harp for intuitive control and the weighted base keeps the lamp steady on side tables.

fields.name: Cove Woven Throw
fields.name_description: A soft woven throw with fringed ends — designed for layering on sofas and beds to add texture and cosy warmth.
fields.description: Cove Woven Throw is crafted from a breathable blended yarn that drapes naturally over furniture. The subtle weave pattern adds depth to neutral interiors while the fringed edge provides a handcrafted finish.
fields.metal: Cotton & acrylic blend — soft woven yarn

fields.name: Dune Rattan Basket
fields.name_description: A handwoven rattan basket with reinforced rim — ideal for storing throws, magazines, or soft toys with rustic appeal.
fields.description: Dune Rattan Basket is woven from sustainable rattan fibres and features a sturdy rim that retains shape under load. The breathable weave keeps stored items aired while adding natural texture to shelving or floor corners.

fields.name: Elm Framed Mirror
fields.name_description: A rectangular wall mirror with slim timber frame — meant to brighten small rooms and create a sense of depth in hallways.
fields.description: Elm Framed Mirror is mounted in a sustainably sourced timber frame with a subtle bevel. The reflective surface is silver-backed for clarity and the included hanging hardware ensures secure wall mounting.
fields.metal: Oak timber frame & glass — natural finish

fields.name: Fable Ceramic Candle
fields.name_description: A soy-wax scented candle in a glazed ceramic pot — created to provide gentle fragrance and an elegant decorative accent.
fields.short_description: Scented soy candle in ceramic pot
fields.description: Fable Ceramic Candle combines a clean-burning soy wax with blended essential oils for a long-lasting aroma. The ceramic vessel can be repurposed after use and the single-cotton wick ensures an even burn pool.

fields.name: Grove Decorative Tray
fields.name_description: A lacquered serving tray with raised edges — designed to organise small items or present drinks with contemporary polish.
fields.description: Grove Decorative Tray has a smooth lacquer finish that resists light spills and wipes clean easily. The raised lip prevents items from sliding while the neutral palette complements modern and classic interiors alike.
fields.metal: MDF with lacquer finish — smooth surface

fields.name: Haven Table Runner
fields.name_description: A hand-loomed table runner with stitched hem — meant to anchor dining tables and protect surfaces while adding visual interest.
fields.description: Haven Table Runner is woven from a durable linen blend with reinforced hems to reduce fraying. The understated pattern provides a subtle backdrop for centrepieces while tolerating everyday use and light washing.

fields.name: Iris Pampas Bundle
fields.name_description: A decorative bundle of dried pampas grass with tied base — created to add soft height and movement to corners and vases.
fields.description: Iris Pampas Bundle is hand-selected for full plumes and natural colour variation. The stems are tied securely and can be trimmed to suit arrangements, offering long-lasting texture without maintenance.

fields.name: Juniper Wall Art Panel
fields.name_description: A framed textured wall panel with mixed-media finish — designed to create a focal point above sofas and beds.
fields.description: Juniper Wall Art Panel layers subtle pigments and fabric textures beneath a protective varnish to retain colour vibrancy. The shallow frame sits flush to walls and the neutral tones integrate easily with varied decor schemes.

fields.name: Kite Brass Candle Holder
fields.name_description: A decorative brass candle holder with minimalist lines — meant for pillar candles on mantels and dining tables.
fields.description: Kite Brass Candle Holder is cast from solid brass with a clean silhouette that elevates candle displays. The broad base reduces tipping and the polished finish subtly warms ambient lighting when the candle is lit.

fields.name: Lumen Ceramic Planter
fields.name_description: A modern ceramic planter with drainage hole and saucer — designed to support indoor plants while protecting surfaces.
fields.description: Lumen Ceramic Planter features a matt exterior and glazed interior to retain soil moisture while allowing excess water to drain into the matching saucer. The neutral finish complements a range of greenery.

fields.name: Marlow Terracotta Diffuser
fields.name_description: A terracotta essential-oil diffuser with minimalist base — crafted to subtly scent small rooms and workspaces.
fields.description: Marlow Terracotta Diffuser wicks oils into the porous clay to release fragrance slowly without heat. The compact footprint suits bedside tables and desks, offering continuous scent without electricity.

fields.name: Nora Glass Terrarium
fields.name_description: A geometric glass terrarium with brass frame — ideal for succulents and miniature plant displays on shelves and tables.
fields.short_description: Geometric glass terrarium with brass frame
fields.description: Nora Glass Terrarium combines clear glass panels with a slim metal frame to create a modern showcase for small plants. The hinged panel allows easy access for planting and maintenance while retaining humidity.

fields.name: Orla Wool Cushion
fields.name_description: A hand-knitted wool cushion cover with inner pad included — built to add softness and sculptural texture to seating.
fields.description: Orla Wool Cushion is knitted from spun wool yarn and filled with a supportive inner pad for immediate plumping. The zip closure allows removal for gentle washing and the neutral tone layers with patterned cushions.

fields.name: Pine Hanging Planter
fields.name_description: A suspended ceramic hanging planter with braided cord — intended for trailing plants to decorate windows and alcoves.
fields.description: Pine Hanging Planter includes a glazed pot and sturdy braided cord to hold trailing plants securely. The compact size suits small succulents or ivy and the low-sheen glaze avoids distracting glare in bright rooms.

fields.name: Quince Accent Clock
fields.name_description: A minimalist wall clock with silent sweep movement — designed to keep time discreetly and complement pared-back interiors.
fields.short_description: Minimal wall clock with silent sweep
fields.description: Quince Accent Clock features a matte face and faceted hands that rotate on a silent sweep mechanism to eliminate ticking. The slim profile makes it suitable for bedrooms and study walls without drawing attention.

fields.name: Rowan Brass Hook Set
fields.name_description: A set of wall hooks with brass finish and concealed fixings — made for hanging coats, towels and accessories neatly.
fields.description: Rowan Brass Hook Set includes multiple hook sizes with screw fixings hidden behind a decorative plate. The robust castings hold weight reliably while the warm brass finish complements vintage and contemporary fittings.

fields.name: Sable Reed Diffuser
fields.name_description: A reed diffuser kit with fragrance oil and natural rattan reeds — designed to scent rooms continuously without flame.
fields.description: Sable Reed Diffuser uses a balanced fragrance blend and natural reeds that draw oil upward to disperse scent. The glass bottle sits stably on surfaces and the intensity can be adjusted by the number of reeds used.

fields.name: Talia Macramé Wall Hanging
fields.name_description: A handcrafted macramé wall hanging with tassels — intended to bring bohemian texture and soft geometry to wall spaces.
fields.description: Talia Macramé Wall Hanging is knotted from cotton cord to create a sculptural display with layered fringe. The natural fibres soften acoustic reflections and the wooden dowel provides an organic suspension point.

fields.name: Uma Accent Bowl
fields.name_description: A decorative stoneware bowl with reactive glaze — crafted to hold keys or act as a sculptural accent on sideboards.
fields.description: Uma Accent Bowl displays depth of colour through a reactive glazing process that produces unique variations on each piece. The substantial weight gives it presence on surfaces and the gently sloped sides cradle objects attractively.

fields.name: Vera Framed Print
fields.name_description: A museum-quality framed art print with anti-glare glass — created to bring colour and composition to living walls.
fields.short_description: Framed art print with anti-glare glass
fields.description: Vera Framed Print is reproduced on archival paper and mounted in a slim timber frame behind anti-glare glass. The heavyweight backing keeps the piece flat and the hanging fittings are included for immediate installation.

fields.name: Wren Ceramic Oil Lamp
fields.name_description: A compact oil lamp with ceramic base and glass chimney — meant for ambient glow during evenings or power-free moments.
fields.short_description: Ceramic oil lamp with glass chimney
fields.description: Wren Ceramic Oil Lamp holds lamp oil in a stable base with a slender wick adjusted beneath a glass chimney to maximise steady flame. The ceramic surface is glazed for easy cleaning and safe handling.

fields.name: Xylan Marble Coasters
fields.name_description: A set of polished marble coasters with cork backing — crafted to protect surfaces while adding tactile luxury to coffee tables.
fields.description: Xylan Marble Coasters are precision-cut and polished to reveal natural veining while cork undersides prevent slipping and surface marking. The matched set stacks neatly when not in use and elevates tabletop styling.

fields.name: Yara Beaded Garland
fields.name_description: A decorative beaded garland with mixed wood and ceramic beads — ideal for draping mantels and bowl displays for layered texture.
fields.description: Yara Beaded Garland strings assorted bead sizes and finishes on durable twine to create a tactile accent for styling. The neutral palette works with seasonal decor while the looped ends make hanging simple.
fields.metal: Wood & ceramic beads on cotton twine

fields.name: Zephyr Tabletop Sculpture
fields.name_description: A small abstract tabletop sculpture in forged metal — designed to add modern form and contrast on shelves and consoles.
fields.description: Zephyr Tabletop Sculpture is hand-forged and finished with a matte patina to emphasise form over shine. The compact footprint provides sculptural interest without overwhelming smaller surfaces.

fields.name: Avon Glass Hurricane
fields.name_description: A tall glass hurricane lantern with ridged base — meant to house pillar candles and create dramatic table centre lighting.
fields.description: Avon Glass Hurricane features thick crystal-clear glass to protect flames from drafts while enhancing candle glow. The broad base secures the lantern and the open top allows heat to escape safely.

fields.name: Briar Decorative Ladder
fields.name_description: A leaning decorative ladder in reclaimed timber — intended for draping throws or displaying textiles and towels.
fields.description: Briar Decorative Ladder is milled from reclaimed timber with smooth rungs to protect fabrics. The angled design leans against walls for effortless styling and folds flat for occasional repositioning.

fields.name: Cleo Ceramic Tealight Set
fields.name_description: A set of small ceramic tealight holders with glazed interiors — created for clustered candle displays and subtle table lighting.
fields.description: Cleo Ceramic Tealight Set includes three holders in graduated sizes, each glazed inside to contain wax and resist staining. The soft palette coordinates with neutral decor while providing layered candlelight.

fields.name: Dune Patterned Rug
fields.name_description: A low-pile patterned rug with anti-slip backing — designed to define seating areas and add graphic interest to floors.
fields.description: Dune Patterned Rug is machine-woven for durability with a dense low pile that resists flattening in high-traffic areas. The anti-slip backing keeps the rug in place while the woven pattern hides day-to-day wear.

fields.name: Eden Ceramic Wall Pocket
fields.name_description: A glazed wall pocket planter for small trailing plants — intended to add vertical greenery to kitchen or bathroom walls.
fields.description: Eden Ceramic Wall Pocket mounts securely and features a glazed interior to retain moisture while preventing staining. The compact form holds soil and a small plant, creating instant vertical interest on tiled or painted walls.

fields.name: Fjord Wooden Candle Tray
fields.name_description: A turned wooden candle tray with recessed wells — built to hold pillar candles safely and create layered candle displays.
fields.short_description: Turned wooden candle tray with wells
fields.description: Fjord Wooden Candle Tray is milled from solid timber and finished with a food-safe oil to highlight grain. The recessed wells stabilise candles while protecting surfaces from wax drips.

fields.name: Gala Mirrored Box
fields.name_description: A small mirrored keepsake box with hinged lid — designed to store jewellery or small treasures on dressers.
fields.description: Gala Mirrored Box features bevelled mirror panels mounted on a solid base and a soft-lined interior to protect delicate items. The compact design sits elegantly on vanities and consoles.

fields.name: Haven Ceramic Pitcher
fields.name_description: A rustic ceramic pitcher with poured glaze — meant for water, flower arranging or as a decorative statement piece.
fields.description: Haven Ceramic Pitcher is wheel-thrown and finished in a reactive poured glaze that produces subtle colour variations. The generous spout enables easy pouring and the wide base provides stability when filled.

fields.name: Indigo Patterned Cushion
fields.name_description: A printed linen cushion with invisible zip — designed to layer colour and pattern onto sofas and beds with artisan charm.
fields.description: Indigo Patterned Cushion uses a high-quality linen face printed with fade-resistant pigment inks and an inner pad that keeps the cushion plump. The zip is concealed to maintain clean lines when styled.

fields.name: Juno Ceramic Planter Set
fields.name_description: A trio of small ceramic planters with drainage holes — perfect for windowsills and grouping succulents.
fields.description: Juno Ceramic Planter Set offers graduated sizes with glazed interiors and drainage holes to protect roots. The coordinated colours create a cohesive display when grouped on sills or shelves.

fields.name: Koko Woven Pouf
fields.name_description: A hand-knotted woven pouf with removable cover — designed for casual extra seating and relaxed floor arrangements.
fields.description: Koko Woven Pouf is constructed with a sturdy inner fill and a removable hand-crafted cover that can be spot-cleaned. The compact pouf doubles as a footrest or occasional seat in living areas.

fields.name: Luxe Marble Bust
fields.name_description: A small decorative marble bust replica — intended to lend classical form and sculptural interest to shelves and mantels.
fields.description: Luxe Marble Bust is carved from solid marble and hand-finished to reveal subtle veining. The weighted base stabilises the piece and the compact scale integrates easily into curated shelf displays.

fields.name: Mira Rattan Pendant
fields.name_description: A woven rattan pendant light with inner diffuser — crafted to cast warm patterned light and add organic texture overhead.
fields.description: Mira Rattan Pendant suspends from concealed wiring and features a soft inner diffuser to soften bulb glare. The natural rattan weave casts subtle shadow patterns and pairs well with natural-material interiors.

fields.name: Nova Scented Bundle
fields.name_description: A curated home scent bundle with candle and room spray — created to set atmosphere and refresh living spaces with layered fragrance.
fields.description: Nova Scented Bundle pairs a long-burning candle with a complementary room spray for immediate and lasting fragrance. The packaging is gift-ready and the fragrance blend is formulated from natural essential oils.

fields.name: Aero Cotton Duvet Cover
fields.name_description: A breathable cotton duvet cover with button closure — crafted to protect duvets and provide a soft sleeping surface.
fields.description: Aero Cotton Duvet Cover is woven from long-staple cotton for a soft hand and breathable sleep. The concealed button closure and generous corner ties secure the duvet while machine-washable construction keeps care simple for daily use.

fields.name: Baker Linen Sheet Set
fields.name_description: A relaxed-linen sheet set with pre-washed softness — designed to soften further with every wash for a lived-in feel.
fields.description: Baker Linen Sheet Set is crafted from stonewashed linen that drapes naturally and breathes in warm weather. The fitted sheet has deep pockets to accommodate mattresses and the set includes a flat sheet and two pillowcases.

fields.name: Castwell Microfibre Pillow
fields.name_description: A plush microfibre pillow with hypoallergenic fill — engineered for supportive comfort and easy maintenance.
fields.description: Castwell Microfibre Pillow uses a responsive hollowfibre fill that cradles the head while resisting flattening. The breathable cover improves airflow and the pillow is machine-washable to maintain freshness over time.

fields.name: EcoWool Mattress Topper

fields.name: Fusion Quilted Bedspread

fields.name: Junction Mattress Protector

fields.name: KitchPro Bed Skirt

fields.name: Mason Goose-Feel Duvet

fields.description: Mason Goose-Feel Duvet uses clustered fibre fill arranged in baffled boxes to prevent cold spots and maintain even loft. The soft cotton casing ensures a comfortable surface and the duvet compresses readily for storage.

fields.description: Baker Electric Kettle brings water to a boil rapidly using an encapsulated heating element and safety cut-out. The cordless base allows easy pouring and the wide mouth simplifies filling and cleaning.

fields.name: Castwell Hand Mixer
fields.name_description: A lightweight hand mixer with two-speed settings and beaters — intended for everyday mixing and baking tasks.
fields.description: Castwell Hand Mixer balances power and weight for efficient mixing of batters and doughs. The eject button releases metal beaters for quick cleaning and the ergonomic handle reduces fatigue during use.

fields.name: Delta Air Fryer Mini
fields.name_description: A compact air fryer with digital timer — crafted to crisp snacks with minimal oil for healthier frying.
fields.description: Delta Air Fryer Mini circulates hot air at high speed to produce crispy results without deep frying. The removable basket is dishwasher-safe and the digital controls allow precise temperature and time settings.

fields.name: EcoSteel Toaster 2-Slot
fields.name_description: A two-slot toaster with variable browning controls — made for reliable everyday toasting and bagel settings.
fields.description: EcoSteel Toaster offers consistent toasting with multiple shade settings and a removable crumb tray for easy cleaning. The high-lift lever retrieves smaller slices safely and the cool-touch sides add safety.
fields.size: W 30 x D 18 x H 20 cm

fields.name: Fusion Espresso Maker

fields.description: Fusion Espresso Maker uses a 15-bar pump to extract espresso with crema while the steam wand froths milk for cappuccinos. The removable water tank and drip tray simplify refilling and cleaning routines.

fields.name: GrindPro Coffee Grinder
fields.name_description: A burr coffee grinder with adjustable grind settings — intended to produce consistent grounds for brewed coffee.
fields.description: GrindPro Coffee Grinder uses conical burrs to grind beans uniformly and preserves aroma with minimal heat. The hopper holds several doses and the grind selector lets you choose from fine espresso to coarse French press.

fields.name: Hearth Rice Cooker
fields.name_description: A multi-function rice cooker with keep-warm function — crafted to cook rice reliably and reheat dishes gently.
fields.description: Hearth Rice Cooker features preset programmes for white, brown and porridge settings and a keep-warm mode to maintain serving temperature. The non-stick inner pot cleans easily and the measuring cup and spatula are included.

fields.name: Infuse Handheld Vacuum
fields.name_description: A cordless handheld vacuum with crevice tool — made for quick clean-ups in kitchens and small apartments.
fields.description: Infuse Handheld Vacuum provides portable suction for crumbs and spills with a detachable nozzle for crevices and upholstery. The rechargeable battery offers convenient runtime and the dust cup empties with one touch.

fields.name: Junction Electric Griddle
fields.name_description: A non-stick electric griddle plate with temperature control — intended for pancakes, sandwiches and grilled breakfasts.
fields.description: Junction Electric Griddle provides a broad, even-heating surface with adjustable temperature for precise cooking. The removable plate wipes clean easily and the drip channel collects excess fats for healthier cooking.

fields.name: KitchPro Slow Cooker
fields.name_description: A programmable slow cooker with ceramic pot — created for low-and-slow cooking of stews and casseroles.

fields.description: KitchPro Slow Cooker allows delayed start and keep-warm functions for set-and-forget cooking. The removable ceramic pot distributes heat gently and the lid seals in moisture for tender results.

fields.name: LadleMaster Immersion Blender
fields.name_description: A stick immersion blender with variable speed — ideal for soups, sauces and single-bowl blending.
fields.description: LadleMaster Immersion Blender blends directly in pots and bowls with a detachable shaft for easy cleaning. The variable speed control offers gentle pureeing or full-speed emulsification depending on the recipe.

fields.name: Mason Electric Steamer

fields.name: Nimble Electric Milk Frother

fields.description: Nimble Milk Frother creates creamy froth or warm milk using a whisk action and built-in heater. The non-stick jug cleans easily and the compact charger stores neatly between uses.

fields.name: Orbit Smart Scale

fields.description: Orbit Smart Scale provides gram and ounce measurements with a tare function for multi-ingredient weighing. The tempered glass platform wipes clean easily and the display hides when not in use to save power.

fields.name: Panache Sandwich Press

fields.name: Quench Electric Skillet

fields.name: Rivet Soda Maker

fields.description: Mason Milk Bath Soak blends powdered milk with calming botanicals to leave skin feeling nourished and soothed. Use for a gentle, restorative soak that comforts irritated skin.

fields.description: Nimble Citrus Hand Sanitiser sanitises hands effectively while leaving them lightly scented and hydrated with added emollients. The fast-evaporating formula avoids residue for comfortable use on the go.

fields.description: Nora Hydrating Lip Balm soothes chapped lips with emollients and protective waxes that lock in moisture. The compact tin is perfect for handbag or pocket use.

fields.name: Orla Shower Steamers

fields.description: Orla Shower Steamers fizz gently to release invigorating vapours that clear nasal passages and energise the mind. The compact set fits easily into a small bathroom storage box.

fields.name: Parker Citrus Hand & Body Mist

fields.name: Quince Salt & Oil Polish

fields.description: Quince Salt & Oil Polish removes rough skin with mineral-rich sea salt while oils replenish lipids for smoothness. The dual-action formula buffs and conditions in a single step.

fields.name: Rowan Moisturising Foot Balm

fields.description: Rowan Moisturising Foot Balm targets dry, cracked skin with keratolytic urea and deeply nourishing butters. The thick balm forms a protective layer to support overnight repair.

fields.name: Sable Post-Shave Balm

fields.description: Sable Post-Shave Balm cools and calms recently shaved skin using anti-inflammatory botanicals and humectants. The fast-absorbing formula helps reduce redness and tightness.

fields.name: Talia Aromatic Hand Soap
fields.name_description: A foaming hand soap with rosemary and thyme — formulated to cleanse while leaving a herbal scent.
fields.description: Talia Aromatic Hand Soap produces a rich foam that cleanses hands thoroughly while aromatic herbs freshen the skin. The gentle formula avoids tightness and keeps hands soft.

fields.name: Vera Calming Body Serum

fields.description: Vera Calming Body Serum reduces visible redness and restores comfort using soothing oat extracts and niacinamide. The silky serum layer absorbs quickly without stickiness.

fields.name: Willow Natural Deodorant Stick

fields.description: Willow Natural Deodorant Stick controls odour using a gentle baking-soda base and skin-softening butters for all-day freshness. The solid stick glides on smoothly without leaving residue.

fields.name: Xander After-Bath Cooling Gel

fields.description: Xander After-Bath Cooling Gel calms and cools the skin with concentrated aloe and cucumber extracts for instant relief. The gel texture absorbs rapidly leaving a refreshing sensation.

fields.name: Yara Natural Body Mist

fields.name: Zephyr Scented Soap Gift Set

fields.description: Zephyr Scented Soap Gift Set includes three fragranced bars wrapped for gifting with complementary aromatics and nourishing oils. The set is presented in a recyclable box ready for gifting.

fields.name: Avon Lavender Pillow Mist

fields.description: Avon Lavender Pillow Mist lightly scents linens to create a calming sleep ritual with pure lavender essence. The fine mist settles quickly and leaves a soothing aromatic presence.

fields.name: Briar Silk Body Oil

fields.description: Briar Silk Body Oil seals in moisture and imparts a luminous sheen with a lightweight, fast-absorbing blend. The non-sticky finish makes it suitable for daytime or evening use.

fields.name: Cleo Moisturising Hand Mask

fields.description: Cleo Moisturising Hand Mask delivers concentrated humectants and barrier-supporting lipids in a convenient single-use format. Wear overnight for visibly softer, repaired hands by morning.

fields.description: Dune Sea Salt Conditioner Bar detangles and smooths hair with concentrated conditioning butters while minimising plastic use. The compact bar is ideal for travellers and minimalists alike.

fields.name: Eden Calming Body Cream

fields.description: Eden Calming Body Cream deeply replenishes dry skin with restorative oils and soothing oat extract to reduce irritation. The rich texture is ideal for elbows, knees and winter care rituals.

fields.name: Fjord Spa Head-to-Toe Wash

fields.description: Fjord Spa Head-to-Toe Wash cleanses delicately while protecting fragile skin barriers with mild surfactants and soothing botanicals. The tear-free formula keeps bath time calm and safe for little ones.

fields.name: Gala Radiant Body Serum

fields.description: Gala Radiant Body Serum imparts subtle luminosity while delivering moisture with humectants for smooth, glowing skin. The lightweight formula blends easily and layers under clothing without transfer.

fields.name: Haven Cooling After-Sun Gel
fields.name_description: A fast-absorbing after-sun gel with aloe and cooling menthol — formulated to soothe sun-exposed skin.
fields.description: Haven Cooling After-Sun Gel replenishes hydration while delivering a cooling sensation to overheated skin with menthol and aloe. The lightweight gel reduces discomfort and helps restore skin balance.

fields.name: Indigo Botanical Hand Wash
fields.name_description: A nourishing hand wash with botanical extracts and mild surfactants — crafted to clean and protect skin's moisture.
fields.description: Indigo Botanical Hand Wash gently removes grime while botanical extracts support skin comfort and hydration. The creamy foam rinses away cleanly, leaving hands refreshed.

fields.name: Juno Detox Mud Mask

fields.description: Juno Detox Mud Mask pulls impurities and excess oil from skin while minerals help refine pores and texture. Apply as a targeted treatment to rough areas for a deep-cleansing boost.

fields.name: Keen Bamboo Body Brush

fields.description: Keen Bamboo Body Brush exfoliates gently with firm natural bristles to improve circulation and skin texture before showering. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip for full-body use.

fields.name: Luxe Vanilla & Amber Soap
fields.name_description: A luxury bar soap with vanilla and amber essential oils — crafted for a warm, comforting wash experience.
fields.short_description: Vanilla & amber scented luxury soap bar
fields.description: Luxe Vanilla & Amber Soap cleanses with a rich lather and leaves skin perfumed with warm gourmand notes. The moisturizing base keeps skin soft without tightness after rinsing.

fields.name: Mingle Soothing Body Gel
fields.name_description: A soothing body gel with calendula and panthenol — formulated to calm sensitised skin after treatments.
fields.description: Mingle Soothing Body Gel reduces discomfort and supports barrier recovery with calming botanicals and panthenol. The lightweight gel absorbs quickly leaving skin calm and comfortable.

fields.name: Aero Energising Face Wash

fields.short_description: Energising foaming face wash with caffeine
fields.description: Aero Energising Face Wash removes excess oil and surface impurities while the caffeine infusion helps awaken tired skin. The gentle foam rinses clean without leaving tightness.

fields.name: Baker Precision Shaving Cream
fields.name_description: A creamy shaving formula with glycerin and aloe — formulated for smooth, irritation-free shaves.

fields.description: Baker Precision Shaving Cream builds a protective, lubricating lather that softens stubble for a close shave. The soothing botanicals reduce razor burn and leave skin comfortable.

fields.name: Castwell Beard Oil
fields.name_description: A lightweight beard oil with argan and jojoba — designed to soften facial hair and condition skin beneath.
fields.description: Castwell Beard Oil tames flyaways and adds natural-looking sheen while nourishing the skin to prevent itch. The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly for manageable beard styling.

fields.name: Delta Aftershave Balm
fields.name_description: A calming aftershave with aloe and chamomile — crafted to reduce post-shave irritation and hydrate skin.
fields.description: Delta Aftershave Balm cools and repairs freshly shaved skin using anti-inflammatory botanicals and humectants. The lightweight balm absorbs rapidly leaving no greasy residue.

fields.name: EcoSteel Mattifying Gel
fields.name_description: A lightweight mattifying gel with niacinamide — formulated to control shine and refine pores.
fields.description: EcoSteel Mattifying Gel reduces visible shine and helps tighten pores for a smoother complexion. The oil-free formula layers well under moisturiser or sunscreen.

fields.name: Fusion Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
fields.name_description: A medicated shampoo with zinc pyrithione and tea tree — created to reduce flaking and soothe the scalp.
fields.description: Fusion Anti-Dandruff Shampoo cleanses effectively while active ingredients target flakiness and irritation at the root. Regular use helps restore scalp balance and reduce visible flakes.

fields.name: GrindPro Styling Paste
fields.name_description: A medium-hold styling paste with beeswax and shea — made to create texture and hold without stiffness.
fields.description: GrindPro Styling Paste sculpts hair with flexible hold and natural finish while nourishing butters keep strands soft. The formula washes out easily and restyles with water.

fields.name: Hearth Charcoal Face Mask
fields.name_description: A clarifying charcoal mask with kaolin clay — designed to draw out impurities and refine texture.
fields.description: Hearth Charcoal Face Mask unclogs pores and absorbs excess oil while detoxifying minerals refine skin texture. Use weekly for a clearer, mattified complexion.

fields.name: Infuse Night Repair Serum
fields.name_description: A restorative night serum with retinol and peptides — formulated to support skin renewal overnight.
fields.description: Infuse Night Repair Serum promotes cellular turnover and reduces visible signs of fatigue with concentrated actives. The lightweight formula layers beneath moisturiser for overnight repair.

fields.name: Junction Deodorant Spray

fields.description: Junction Deodorant Spray neutralises odour and leaves a crisp, masculine scent that lasts through activity. The quick-dry formula avoids white marks on clothing.

fields.name: KitchPro Body Wash for Men
fields.name_description: A masculine body wash with cedar and citrus — formulated to cleanse and leave an energising scent.

fields.description: KitchPro Body Wash produces a rich lather that cleanses skin while imparting a rugged cedar-citrus scent. The formula rinses clean and helps maintain skin’s natural moisture balance.

fields.name: LadleMaster Matte Pomade

fields.description: LadleMaster Matte Pomade sculpts hair into structured styles with matte finish and lasting hold. The clay-based formula gives texture without stiffness and washes out cleanly.

fields.name: Mason Cooling Aftershave Gel
fields.name_description: A cooling aftershave gel with menthol and witch hazel — made to soothe and tighten pores after shaving.
fields.description: Mason Cooling Aftershave Gel calms razor-irritated skin while witch hazel helps close pores for a clean finish. The lightweight gel absorbs instantly providing an immediate cooling effect.

fields.name: Nora Anti-Frizz Hair Serum

fields.name: Orla Scalp Exfoliator

fields.name: Parker Deep Cleanse Clay Bar

fields.name: Quench Post-Workout Body Wipes

fields.name: Rivet Fragrance Mist for Men

fields.name: SearPro Anti-Aging Eye Cream

fields.description: Vero Deep Pore Cleanser gently exfoliates with AHAs while charcoal binds impurities for a renewed, smoother surface. Regular use helps reduce congestion and improve tone.

fields.name: Whittle Cooling Face Mist

fields.name: Xpress Instant Matte SPF 30

fields.name: Yonder Cooling Scalp Spray

fields.name: Zeal Micro-Exfoliating Scrub

fields.description: Zeal Micro-Exfoliating Scrub buffs skin lightly with jojoba beads while enzymes refine texture for an even tone. The gentle action prevents over-exfoliation and keeps skin comfortable.

fields.description: Alpen Energise Roll-On provides targeted odour control with a fast-drying, non-staining formula that keeps you fresh. The compact roll-on is pocket-friendly for quick touch-ups.

fields.name: Bento Pre-Shave Oil

fields.description: Bento Pre-Shave Oil preps skin and softens stubble to reduce tug during shaving while adding a protective barrier. The non-greasy formula rinses clean and improves razor glide.

fields.name: Droplet Cooling Eye Gel

fields.description: Droplet Cooling Eye Gel reduces under-eye puffiness and refreshes fatigued skin with humectants and caffeine. The lightweight gel absorbs quickly and layers well under eye cream.

fields.name: Evoke Intensive Scalp Tonic

fields.description: Evoke Intensive Scalp Tonic invigorates follicles and supports scalp health with targeted actives that strengthen strands. The non-greasy tonic absorbs quickly for daily use.

fields.name: Feast Tough Hold Gel

fields.name: Glide SPF 50 Tinted Moisturiser

fields.description: Glide SPF 50 Tinted Moisturiser hydrates and provides high sun protection while evening skin tone with a lightweight tint. The breathable formula layers well under makeup or alone.

fields.name: Harvest Solid Cologne Tin

fields.description: Harvest Solid Cologne Tin delivers concentrated fragrance in a portable format that warms with body heat for subtle release. The tin fits pockets and provides easy, mess-free application.

fields.name: Inox Activated Charcoal Soap
fields.name_description: A facial and body soap bar with activated charcoal and tea tree — designed to purify and clarify skin.
fields.description: Inox Activated Charcoal Soap lifts dirt and impurities while tea tree helps soothe blemish-prone areas. The long-lasting bar lathers easily and rinses clean.

fields.name: Joule Precision Nose Trimmer Heads

fields.name: Keen Bamboo Comb

fields.description: Keen Bamboo Comb glides through tangles without pulling and helps distribute styling products evenly. The natural bamboo resists static while being durable for daily use.

fields.name: Luxe Charcoal Toothpaste

fields.description: Luxe Charcoal Toothpaste polishes surface stains while fluoride protects against cavities for daily dental care. The mild mint finish leaves breath feeling fresh without harshness.

fields.name: Mingle Travel Grooming Kit

fields.description: Mingle Travel Grooming Kit contains essential tools for tidy grooming while travelling, all packed in a durable zip case. Each tool is crafted from corrosion-resistant metal for longevity.

fields.name: Basmati Classic 1121

fields.name: Sona Masoori Everyday

fields.description: Sona Masoori Everyday yields soft, non-clumping rice ideal for steamed rice and everyday dishes. Its mild taste and quick cooking time make it pantry essential.
fields.metal: Kraft paper pouch with resealable zip

fields.name: Golden Jasmine Rice
fields.name_description: A fragrant Thai jasmine rice with delicate floral notes — ideal for steamed rice and Asian dishes.
fields.description: Golden Jasmine Rice steams into soft, slightly sticky grains that release a delicate jasmine fragrance while cooking. It pairs beautifully with curries and stir-fries for authentic flavour.

fields.name: Brown Long Grain
fields.name_description: Wholegrain long rice retaining bran for extra fibre and nutty flavour — wholesome everyday choice.
fields.description: Brown Long Grain cooks to separate, slightly chewy grains that preserve nutrients and a warm, nutty taste. It’s a healthy base for grain bowls and hearty pilafs.

fields.name: Organic Red Rice
fields.name_description: A nutrient-rich red rice with earthy flavour and firm texture — excellent for salads and sides.
fields.description: Organic Red Rice delivers a hearty texture and earthy, slightly sweet notes that hold up in mixed salads and pilafs. Its wholegrain structure provides fibre and a satisfying bite.

fields.name: Black Forbidden Rice
fields.name_description: An antioxidant-rich black rice with deep colour and nutty finish — cooks to a fragrant, sticky texture.
fields.description: Black Forbidden Rice turns a glossy, deep purple when cooked and offers a bold nutty flavour with chewy texture. It’s striking in presentation and pairs well with sweet and savoury dishes alike.

fields.name: Arborio Risotto Rice
fields.name_description: Short, starchy arborio rice — perfect for creamy risottos and slow braises.
fields.description: Arborio Risotto Rice releases starch gradually to create the silky, al dente texture risotto requires. It absorbs flavours beautifully and yields a rich, creamy dish when stirred slowly.

fields.name: Sushi Short Grain
fields.name_description: Short-grain Japanese rice for sushi and sticky preparations — glossy and tender when cooked.
fields.description: Sushi Short Grain becomes sticky and glossy, ideal for forming sushi rice and onigiri. Its mild sweetness and firm body help it bind without losing chew.

fields.name: Parboiled Golden Rice
fields.name_description: Parboiled rice steamed before milling — retains more nutrients and cooks firm and separate.
fields.description: Parboiled Golden Rice yields separate, non-sticky grains and holds shape well in pilafs and biryanis. The pre-steaming process locks in vitamins and improves shelf stability.

fields.name: Broken Rice Coarse
fields.name_description: Coarse broken rice useful for porridges and certain regional dishes — quick cooking and economical.

fields.description: Broken Rice Coarse absorbs flavours quickly and softens rapidly, making it ideal for congee and economical recipes. Its texture suits stewed and slow-cooked meals where disintegration is desired.

fields.name: Pearl Millet (Bajra)

fields.description: Pearl Millet (Bajra) offers a mildly nutty flavour and coarse texture that toasts well in flatbreads and porridges. It’s naturally gluten-free and rich in fibre and minerals.

fields.name: Quinoa White Premium
fields.name_description: Protein-rich white quinoa with mild nutty flavour — cooks fluffy and versatile for salads and sides.
fields.description: Quinoa White Premium provides a light, fluffy texture with a subtle nutty taste that complements salads and pilafs. It’s naturally gluten-free and an excellent plant protein source.

fields.name: Red Quinoa Ancient
fields.name_description: Whole red quinoa with robust texture — holds shape well in warm salads and stews.
fields.description: Red Quinoa Ancient retains a firmer bite and earthier flavour perfect for warm grain salads and stuffing. Its vivid colour also enhances presentation for plated dishes.

fields.name: Pearl Barley Select
fields.name_description: Polished barley grains that cook to tender chew — ideal for soups, risottos and stews.
fields.description: Pearl Barley Select offers a pleasant chewy bite and absorbs flavours well when simmered in broths and casseroles. It cooks faster than hulled barley while retaining hearty texture.

fields.name: Hulled Oats Whole

fields.description: Hulled Oats Whole retain the nutritious bran and germ, making them ideal for long-soak porridges and baking. Their hearty texture gives body to mueslis and rustic breads.

fields.name: Rolled Oats Fine

fields.name: Semolina (Rava) Coarse

fields.name: Fine Sooji (Semolina)

fields.name: White Cornmeal (Polenta)
fields.name_description: Ground white cornmeal suitable for polenta, porridge and baking — coarse, hearty grind.
fields.description: White Cornmeal (Polenta) produces a creamy porridge or firm polenta when cooked and sets into slices for frying or grilling. Its neutral flavour pairs well with robust sauces and cheeses.

fields.name: Bulgur Wheat Fine
fields.name_description: Pre-cooked cracked wheat for quick tabbouleh, pilafs and salads — tender and nutty.
fields.description: Bulgur Wheat Fine hydrates quickly and offers a pleasant chew that works well in salads and warm grain dishes. Its parboiled nature shortens cooking time while keeping texture intact.

fields.name: Couscous Moroccan
fields.name_description: Small pasta-like semolina pearls for quick steaming and salads — light and fluffy when prepared.
fields.description: Couscous Moroccan steams quickly to tender pearls that pair with stews and roasted vegetables for a classic North African side. Its neutral profile soaks up broths and sauces readily.

fields.name: Buckwheat Groats
fields.name_description: Toasted buckwheat groats (kasha) with earthy, nutty notes — versatile for porridge and side dishes.
fields.description: Buckwheat Groats provide a nutty, robust flavour perfect for savoury porridges and pilafs. They cook quickly and offer gluten-free grain alternatives for varied diets.

fields.name: Amaranth Tiny Grain
fields.name_description: Small ancient grain high in protein — cooks to creamy porridge or pops like popcorn for toppings.
fields.description: Amaranth Tiny Grain becomes creamy when simmered and provides a pleasantly grainy texture that enriches porridges and soups. Its tiny size makes it quick to cook and highly versatile.

fields.name: Chia Seeds Organic
fields.name_description: Tiny omega-rich seeds that gel in liquids — perfect for puddings, smoothies and baking boosts.
fields.description: Chia Seeds Organic swell into a gel when combined with liquid, offering texture and nutritional benefit to breakfasts and smoothies. They are an easy way to add fibre and healthy fats to recipes.

fields.name: Flaxseed Golden
fields.name_description: Golden flaxseed whole — high in fibre and omega-3s, suitable for grinding into meals or baking.
fields.description: Flaxseed Golden provides nutritional pantry essentials that grind easily for breads, smoothies and cereals. The seeds contribute fibre and healthy alpha-linolenic acid to daily recipes.

fields.name: Pulses Red Lentil (Masoor)
fields.name_description: Split red lentils that cook quickly into soft, creamy textures — pantry staple for dals and soups.
fields.description: Pulses Red Lentil (Masoor) softens rapidly and blends into smooth dals, soups and stews for comforting meals. Its quick cook time makes it ideal for busy weeknight cooking.

fields.name: Green Moong Whole
fields.name_description: Whole green gram with mild earthy flavour — used for sprouting, dals and khichdi.
fields.description: Green Moong Whole are versatile legumes that sprout readily and cook to a tender texture in soups and khichdi. They offer a gentle taste and high protein content for balanced meals.

fields.name: Chana Dal Split
fields.name_description: Split chickpeas (chana dal) with firm texture — excellent in curries, soups and snacks.
fields.description: Chana Dal Split maintains a firm bite and nutty flavour that works well in hearty dals and fritters. It soaks and cooks reliably for consistent home recipes.

fields.name: Black Gram (Urad) Whole
fields.name_description: Whole black gram for dals, idli/dosa batters and nutritive cooking — rich and earthy.
fields.description: Black Gram (Urad) Whole is ideal for traditional batters and slow-cooked dals, contributing creamy texture when cooked. Its hearty profile complements robust flavours in regional recipes.

fields.name: Toor Dal (Arhar) Split
fields.name_description: Split pigeon peas commonly used for dals and stews — cooks creamy and hearty.
fields.description: Toor Dal Split is a staple for classic dals providing a smooth, well-rounded texture and mild flavour when simmered. It combines well with tempering spices and vegetables.

fields.name: Pearl Millet Flour (Bajra Atta)
fields.name_description: Stone-milled bajra flour for rotis and flatbreads — rustic texture and full flavour.
fields.description: Pearl Millet Flour produces wholesome rotis and baked goods with a distinct nutty flavour and coarse texture. Use blended with wheat flour for pliable doughs and improved nutrition.

fields.name: Sorghum (Jowar) Grain
fields.name_description: Whole sorghum grains for milling, porridge and gluten-free cooking — mild, adaptable grain.
fields.description: Sorghum (Jowar) Grain cooks into a tender, slightly chewy texture suitable for porridges and savoury dishes. It’s naturally gluten-free and works well ground into flour for flatbreads.

fields.name: Millet Foxtail (Kangni)
fields.name_description: Foxtail millet suitable for porridges and pilafs — small, tender grains with mild sweetness.
fields.description: Millet Foxtail cooks quickly to a fluffy, slightly chewy texture and adds subtle sweetness to dishes. It’s a nutritious, gluten-free substitute for rice in many recipes.

fields.name: Corn Grits Yellow
fields.name_description: Coarse yellow corn grits suitable for porridge, polenta and baking — hearty and rustic.
fields.short_description: Yellow corn grits for porridge & polenta
fields.description: Corn Grits Yellow create thick, comforting porridge and can be set and fried for crisp sides. Their coarse nature holds up to bold flavours and long cooking times.

fields.name: Pearled Millet (Ragi) Flour
fields.name_description: Ragi (finger millet) fine flour for porridge, baking and traditional dishes — nutrient dense and earthy.
fields.description: Pearled Millet (Ragi) Flour adds a wholesome, slightly nutty flavour to porridges and baked goods while offering calcium and fibre. It blends well with wheat or rice flours for varied textures.

fields.name: Buckwheat Flour Soba
fields.name_description: Stone-milled buckwheat flour for noodles and gluten-free baking — earthy and robust.
fields.description: Buckwheat Flour Soba provides a strong, toasty flavour ideal for making soba noodles and hearty breads. It blends well with lighter flours to balance density.

fields.name: Split Yellow Moong Dal
fields.name_description: Split yellow moong dal for quick dals and soups — mild flavour and fast cooking.
fields.description: Split Yellow Moong Dal cooks to a soft, creamy consistency suitable for quick dals and purees. Its gentle taste is excellent for baby food and light soups.

fields.name: White Sorghum Flour
fields.name_description: Fine white sorghum flour for gluten-free baking and flatbreads — neutral taste and fine crumb.
fields.description: White Sorghum Flour offers a light, neutral base for gluten-free baking and combines well with starches for improved texture. It’s a versatile pantry flour with mild flavour.

fields.name: Mixed Grain Muesli
fields.name_description: A blend of rolled oats, barley flakes, millet and seeds — ready for breakfast and baking.
fields.short_description: Mixed grain muesli with seeds & flakes
fields.description: Mixed Grain Muesli combines toasted oats, barley flakes and seeds for a crunchy, nutrient-dense breakfast cereal. It’s ready to eat with milk or yogurt and adds texture to baking.

fields.name: Five Grain Millet Mix
fields.name_description: A wholesome mix of millet, sorghum, barley, quinoa and amaranth — balanced nutrition in one pack.
fields.description: Five Grain Millet Mix blends complementary grains for a balanced texture and flavour suitable for porridge and pilafs. The mix simplifies meal prep while boosting fibre and micronutrient variety.

fields.name: Aroma Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil
fields.name_description: Unrefined cold-pressed coconut oil retaining natural aroma and medium-chain triglycerides — suitable for cooking and skin use.
fields.description: Aroma Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil is extracted without heat to preserve aroma and nutrients, offering a versatile cooking and topical oil. Its stable saturated profile makes it ideal for medium-heat cooking and hair treatments.

fields.name: Basil Pure Desi Ghee
fields.name_description: Traditionally cultured desi ghee made from cow's milk — clarified to deliver a rich, nutty flavour for cooking and finishing.
fields.description: Basil Pure Desi Ghee is simmered slowly to remove moisture while preserving a roasted butter aroma ideal for dals and parathas. The shelf-stable clarified butter provides depth of flavour and high smoke point for frying.

fields.name: Crown Cold-Pressed Sesame Oil
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed sesame oil with toasted notes — suited for dressings, marinades and light frying.
fields.description: Crown Cold-Pressed Sesame Oil provides a pronounced, nutty flavour perfect for finishing dishes and stir-fries. The unrefined extraction preserves natural antioxidants and aromatic compounds.

fields.name: Delta Sunflower Refined Oil
fields.name_description: Refined sunflower oil with neutral flavour and high smoke point — ideal for deep-frying and everyday cooking.
fields.description: Delta Sunflower Refined Oil provides a light neutral frying medium that resists oxidation at high temperatures. The refined process yields a clean-tasting oil suitable for all-purpose culinary use.

fields.name: EcoSteel Groundnut (Peanut) Oil
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed groundnut oil offering a mild nutty aroma — suitable for stir-frying and shallow frying.
fields.description: EcoSteel Groundnut Oil has a pleasant, lightly nutty flavour and a relatively high smoke point for everyday frying. The cold-pressed process preserves natural tocopherols and taste.

fields.name: Fusion Cold-Pressed Olive Oil Extra Virgin
fields.name_description: First-press extra virgin olive oil with grassy and peppery notes — ideal for dressings and low-heat finishing.
fields.description: Fusion Extra Virgin Olive Oil is stone-pressed and filtered to retain bright, fruity nuances and a peppery finish. Use it for salads, dips and finishing cooked vegetables to preserve delicate flavours.
fields.metal: Dark green glass bottle & aluminium pourer

fields.name: GrindPro Rice Bran Oil
fields.name_description: Refined rice bran oil with balanced flavour and high heat capacity — suitable for deep frying and roasting.
fields.description: GrindPro Rice Bran Oil offers stability at high temperatures and a neutral taste that supports versatile cooking techniques. Its composition includes natural antioxidants for improved shelf life.

fields.name: Hearth Flaxseed (Linseed) Oil
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed flaxseed oil rich in omega-3 fatty acids — recommended for cold applications like dressings and supplements.
fields.description: Hearth Flaxseed Oil is high in alpha-linolenic acid and should be used cold to preserve nutrients and prevent oxidation. Add to smoothies or dressings for plant-based essential fatty acids.

fields.name: Infuse Mustard Oil Cold-Pressed
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed mustard oil with pungent aroma — used in traditional regional cuisines and for pickling.
fields.description: Infuse Mustard Oil delivers characteristic heat and depth that enhances pickles and robust cooking styles. The cold-pressed extraction retains volatile flavour compounds prized in many recipes.

fields.name: Junction Organic Ghee Clarified Butter
fields.name_description: Organic ghee made from grass-fed butter — clarified and slow-simmered for a rich aromatic finish.
fields.description: Junction Organic Ghee imparts a deep, roasted butter aroma and a silky mouthfeel for cooking and finishing. Its high smoke point and concentrated fats make it excellent for sautéing and flavouring dishes.

fields.name: KitchPro Avocado Oil Pure
fields.name_description: Refined avocado oil with high smoke point and neutral taste — suited for searing and roasting.
fields.description: KitchPro Avocado Oil offers stability at searing temperatures while providing a subtle, buttery note. The refined process removes impurities, making it versatile for both cooking and baking.

fields.name: LadleMaster Clarified Cow Butter Ghee
fields.name_description: A premium cow's milk ghee clarified slowly for a nutty aroma — traditionally produced for robust flavour.
fields.description: LadleMaster Clarified Ghee is simmered to concentrate flavours and remove moisture, producing a long-lasting cooking fat with rich aroma. It adds depth to both sweet and savoury preparations.

fields.name: Mason Organic Almond Oil
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed sweet almond oil suitable for culinary use and skin massage — light, nutty and versatile.
fields.description: Mason Organic Almond Oil is a mild, emollient oil prized for salads and body care rituals due to its light texture. It provides vitamin-rich nourishment without overpowering other flavours or fragrances.
fields.metal: Amber glass bottle & aluminium dropper cap

fields.name: Nimble Sesame Oil Refined
fields.name_description: Refined light sesame oil with neutral flavour — good for high-heat cooking where sesame taste is not desired.
fields.description: Nimble Sesame Oil Refined offers the functional heat tolerance of refined oils while remaining cost-effective for everyday frying. Its neutral profile supports a wide range of recipes without affecting final aromas.

fields.name: Nora Cold-Pressed Walnut Oil
fields.name_description: Artisanal walnut oil cold-pressed to retain delicate nutty flavour — best used in dressings and low-heat recipes.
fields.description: Nora Walnut Oil brings a rich, toasted nut character to vinaigrettes and finishing drizzles while retaining delicate omega fats. Store refrigerated after opening to preserve freshness and aroma.

fields.name: Orla Organic Groundnut Oil Cold-Pressed
fields.name_description: Certified organic groundnut oil cold-pressed to deliver natural flavor for sautéing and shallow frying.
fields.description: Orla Organic Groundnut Oil provides a clean nutty aroma and stable frying characteristics while maintaining organic certification. It’s suitable for everyday cooking and traditional recipes requiring peanut oil flavour.

fields.name: Parker Cold-Pressed Hemp Seed Oil
fields.name_description: Nutty, omega-rich hemp seed oil cold-pressed for cold applications such as dressings and topical use.
fields.description: Parker Hemp Seed Oil offers a green, nutty character rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidants for nutritional and topical uses. Use sparingly as a finishing oil or in chilled preparations to preserve benefits.

fields.name: Quince Cold-Pressed Safflower Oil
fields.name_description: Light safflower oil extracted cold to preserve a clean taste — suited for dressings and light frying.
fields.description: Quince Safflower Oil provides a neutral, light-bodied oil suitable for delicate dressings and low-heat cooking. It offers unsaturated fat profile for heart-healthy preparations when used judiciously.

fields.name: Rowan Virgin Cottonseed Oil
fields.name_description: Virgin cottonseed oil with mild flavour — widely used in commercial frying and bakery applications.
fields.description: Rowan Cottonseed Oil offers reliable heat stability and a neutral taste for frying, baking and confectionery use. The refined yet low-flavour profile makes it suitable where oil taste must remain unobtrusive.

fields.name: Sable Aromatic Garlic Infused Oil
fields.name_description: Olive oil infused with roasted garlic for aromatic finishing and light sautéing.
fields.description: Sable Garlic Infused Oil brings roasted garlic depth to dressings, marinades and finishing touches while delivering olive oil richness. Use sparingly to add an immediate aromatic lift to cooked dishes.

fields.name: Talia Cold-Pressed Canola (Rapeseed) Oil
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed canola oil with mild taste and balanced fatty acid profile — fit for dressings and cooking.
fields.description: Talia Canola Oil provides a neutral base with a favourable unsaturated fat profile for daily culinary use. The cold-pressed product retains light flavour notes suitable for vinaigrettes and light sautés.

fields.name: Uma Cold-Pressed Macadamia Oil
fields.name_description: Luxurious macadamia oil with buttery notes — suitable for finishing dishes and topical hair treatments.
fields.description: Uma Macadamia Oil adds a rich, buttery nuance and high monounsaturated fat content ideal for finishing and skin care. The delicate flavour pairs well with seafood and roasted vegetables.

fields.name: Vera Clarified Buffalo Ghee
fields.name_description: Rich buffalo milk ghee with deeper flavour and creamy texture — suited for traditional sweets and rich gravies.
fields.description: Vera Buffalo Ghee has a fuller mouthfeel and intense buttery aroma that elevates festive dishes and halwa preparations. The concentrated fats provide robust flavour and long shelf life when stored airtight.

fields.name: Willow Extra Light Olive Oil
fields.name_description: Refined extra light olive oil with high smoke point and subtle taste — designed for frying and baking.
fields.description: Willow Extra Light Olive Oil provides olive-derived fats with a neutral flavour suitable for high-heat cooking and baking. Its refined profile offers functional benefits without the characteristic olive taste.

fields.name: Xander Ghee Clarified A2 Cow
fields.name_description: A2 cow-ghee clarified from traditional cultured butter — prized for flavour and perceived digestibility.
fields.description: Xander A2 Ghee is prepared from cultured A2 milk butter delivering a clean, roasted aroma and creamy texture. Its versatile culinary profile suits both frying and finishing applications.

fields.name: Yara Refined Palm Oil
fields.name_description: Refined palm oil with balanced heat stability — commonly used in large-scale frying and bakery production.
fields.description: Yara Refined Palm Oil provides cost-effective heat-stable frying performance and consistent texture for bakery and snack manufacturing. The refined supply maintains neutral taste and prolonged shelf life.

fields.name: Zephyr Cold-Pressed Pumpkin Seed Oil
fields.name_description: Deep green pumpkin seed oil with rich nutty flavour — ideal as a finishing oil for salads and soups.
fields.description: Zephyr Pumpkin Seed Oil imparts a bold, toasted seed flavour and antioxidant properties, perfect for drizzling over chilled dishes. Due to its delicate nature, use it unheated to retain nutritional value.

fields.name: Avon Ghee Spiced (Jeera Infused)
fields.name_description: Clarified ghee infused with toasted cumin for aromatic finishing in traditional dishes.
fields.description: Avon Spiced Ghee blends roasted cumin into clarified butter to lend warm, earthy notes to dals and sabzis. The infusion provides immediate seasoning and aroma during tempering.

fields.name: Briar Light Sesame Oil (Cold-Pressed)
fields.name_description: Light cold-pressed sesame oil with a delicate toasted aroma — ideal for drizzling and marinades.
fields.description: Briar Light Sesame Oil offers gentle toasted notes and a smooth mouthfeel that elevates vinaigrettes and noodle dishes. Store away from heat to maintain the nutty aroma.

fields.name: Cleo Organic Virgin Coconut Oil Jar
fields.name_description: Organic virgin coconut oil in jar format for cooking and hair care — aromatic and minimally processed.
