fields.description: Cleo Organic Virgin Coconut Oil is versatile for low-heat cooking and an effective topical moisturiser with natural aroma. The jar format is convenient for spooning into recipes and DIY personal care blends.

fields.name: Dune Refined Canola Oil
fields.name_description: Refined canola oil with neutral taste for everyday cooking and baking needs.
fields.description: Dune Refined Canola Oil supplies a light, neutral base suitable for frying, baking and dressings without influencing final flavour. The product is processed for stability and broad culinary use.

fields.name: Eden Roasted Sesame Oil Dark
fields.name_description: Dark roasted sesame oil with intense, toasted aroma — perfect for finishing and traditional Asian cooking.
fields.description: Eden Roasted Sesame Oil adds bold toasted sesame character to dressings, noodles and marinades, enhancing umami depth. Use in small quantities to impart pronounced aroma without overpowering dishes.

fields.name: Fjord Extra Light Sunflower Oil
fields.name_description: Extra light sunflower oil refined for neutral taste and consistent frying performance.
fields.description: Fjord Extra Light Sunflower Oil supports high-heat frying and deep-frying applications with minimal flavour carryover. The refined oil offers reliability in commercial and home kitchens alike.

fields.name: Gala Pumpkin Seed Ghee Blend
fields.name_description: A hybrid spread combining clarified butter with pressed pumpkin seed oil for nuanced flavour.
fields.short_description: Ghee blended with pumpkin seed oil
fields.description: Gala Pumpkin Seed Ghee Blend marries roasted seed notes with the silky texture of clarified butter for unique finishing touches. Use it to enrich soups, sauces and grains with an indulgent aroma.

fields.name: Haven Toasted Coconut Cooking Oil
fields.name_description: Toasted coconut oil with a pronounced roasted aroma — excellent for baking and tropical-themed dishes.
fields.description: Haven Toasted Coconut Oil lends a warm toasted coconut nuance to baked goods and savoury curry bases. Its aromatic profile stands up to cooking while imparting tropical character.

fields.name: Indigo Sesame & Lemon Infused Oil
fields.name_description: A flavoured oil combining cold-pressed sesame with lemon zest for bright finishing touches.
fields.short_description: Sesame oil finished with lemon zest
fields.description: Indigo Sesame & Lemon Oil blends toasted sesame depth with citrus brightness ideal for dressings and grilled vegetables. The infusion adds a fresh lift while preserving sesame character.

fields.name: Juno Ghee Clarified Aged
fields.name_description: Aged clarified ghee with matured aroma — slow-cooked for deeper, caramelised butter notes.
fields.short_description: Aged clarified ghee with caramel notes
fields.description: Juno Aged Ghee develops a rich, caramelised butter flavour through extended simmering that enhances gravies and sweets. The concentrated fat offers superior mouthfeel and aroma when used as a finishing element.

fields.name: Keen Cold-Pressed Walnut & Herb Oil
fields.name_description: Cold-pressed walnut oil blended with garden herbs for aromatic finishing and dressings.
fields.description: Keen Walnut & Herb Oil offers toasted nut flavour lifted by rosemary and thyme for complex finishing notes. Use as a drizzle on roasted vegetables or mixed into grain salads.

fields.name: Luxe Ghee Clarified (Premium)
fields.name_description: Premium clarified ghee offering smooth texture and rich aroma — suitable for both cooking and ceremonial use.
fields.description: Luxe Ghee Clarified is crafted from high-quality butter and clarified to produce a silky finish that enhances traditional recipes. The refined flavour profile makes it a luxurious addition to both everyday and special-occasion dishes.

fields.name: Mingle Flax & Sesame Oil Blend
fields.name_description: A nutrition-forward blend of flaxseed and sesame oils formulated for cold applications and wellness use.
fields.short_description: Blend of flaxseed and sesame cold oils
fields.description: Mingle Flax & Sesame Oil Blend marries omega-rich flax with aromatic sesame to create a balanced finishing oil for salads and porridges. Keep refrigerated and use cold to retain nutrient integrity.

fields.name: Aroma Whole Black Peppercorns
fields.name_description: Premium whole black peppercorns with pungent heat and fragrant citrus top notes — ideal for grinding fresh over dishes.
fields.description: Aroma Whole Black Peppercorns offer robust heat and aromatic citrus undertones, perfect for freshly ground seasoning at the table. The whole format preserves volatile oils until crushed for maximum flavour impact.

fields.name: Basil Ground Turmeric Powder
fields.name_description: Fine turmeric powder with warm earthy flavour and bright colour — suitable for curries, marinades and golden milk.
fields.description: Basil Ground Turmeric Powder imparts vibrant colour and mild earthiness to savoury and sweet preparations alike. Its fine grind ensures even integration into batters, sauces and beverages.

fields.name: Crown Garam Masala Blend
fields.name_description: A balanced garam masala of toasted whole spices — formulated to finish curries and rice dishes with warm complexity.
fields.description: Crown Garam Masala Blend provides warm, rounded spice notes from toasted spices that enhance gravies, vegetables and rice. Use sparingly as a finishing spice for maximum aromatic impact.

fields.name: Delta Chana Masala Spice Mix
fields.name_description: Ready-to-use chana masala masala blend with tangy and warm spices — ideal for chickpea curries and stews.
fields.description: Delta Chana Masala Spice Mix balances tangy, spicy and earthy notes to create comforting chickpea curries quickly. The pre-blended mix saves prep time while delivering consistent regional flavour.

fields.name: EcoSteel Cumin Seeds Whole
fields.name_description: Aromatic whole cumin seeds with warm, earthy character — used for tempering, roasting and spice blends.
fields.description: EcoSteel Cumin Seeds Whole release a nutty, smoky aroma when toasted, enriching savoury dishes and dals. Keep whole for tempering or grind fresh for pastes and rubs.

fields.name: Fusion Kashmiri Chilli Powder
fields.name_description: Bright red Kashmiri chilli powder prized for colour and mild heat — perfect for curries and marinades.
fields.description: Fusion Kashmiri Chilli Powder adds a vivid red hue and gentle warmth without overpowering heat, elevating gravies and tandoori marinades. Use to boost colour and flavour while keeping dishes approachable.

fields.name: GrindPro Coriander Powder
fields.name_description: Finely milled coriander powder with citrus and floral top notes — versatile in savoury cooking and spice blends.
fields.description: GrindPro Coriander Powder lends bright citrusy undertones and a gentle warmth that complements meats, vegetables and chutneys. Its fine texture disperses evenly for consistent flavour in sauces and batters.

fields.name: Hearth Fenugreek (Kasuri Methi) Leaves
fields.name_description: Dried fenugreek leaves with warm, slightly bitter aroma — commonly crumbled into dals and curry bases.
fields.description: Hearth Fenugreek Leaves add an herbaceous, slightly bitter lift to curries and bread recipes while enhancing depth of flavour. Use sparingly to avoid overpowering dishes with its concentrated aroma.

fields.name: Infuse Cinnamon Sticks (Dalchini)
fields.name_description: Whole cinnamon sticks with warm sweet-spicy flavour — used for tempering, desserts and spice blends.
fields.description: Infuse Cinnamon Sticks impart sweet, woody aroma to teas, pilafs and slow-cooked dishes while releasing essential oils during simmering. They are ideal for infusions and long-cook recipes where sustained aroma is desired.

fields.name: Junction Garam Tadka Whole Mix
fields.name_description: Toasted whole spices curated for tadka and tempering — ready for hot oil blooming to release aroma.
fields.short_description: Whole tadka spice mix for tempering
fields.description: Junction Garam Tadka Whole Mix bursts into fragrant oils when bloomed in hot ghee or oil, imparting immediate aroma to dals and sabzis. The curated balance of seeds and pods ensures robust tempering results every time.

fields.name: KitchPro Sambar Powder
fields.name_description: Traditional sambar masala blend with roasted lentils and spices — tailored for South Indian sambar and gravies.
fields.description: KitchPro Sambar Powder combines roasted dals, chilli and aromatics to create a balanced base for hearty sambar and vegetable gravies. The roast-forward profile adds depth and body to stews.

fields.name: LadleMaster Mustard Seeds Black
fields.name_description: Black mustard seeds with sharp, pungent character — ideal for tempering and pickles.
fields.description: LadleMaster Mustard Seeds burst with pungent flavour when heated in oil, providing a characteristic snap to South Asian dishes and pickles. The high oil content ensures bright aromatic release on tempering.

fields.name: Mason Stone-Ground Coriander Seeds
fields.name_description: Whole coriander seeds stone-ground for freshness — warm citrusy aroma released on toasting or grinding.
fields.description: Mason Stone-Ground Coriander Seeds release delicate citrus notes when toasted or ground, contributing brightness to masalas and rubs. Grinding whole seeds just before use preserves volatile oils and flavour intensity.

fields.name: Nimble Cardamom Pods Green
fields.name_description: Whole green cardamom pods delivering fragrant lemony and eucalyptus-like notes — used in sweets and savory recipes.
fields.description: Nimble Cardamom Pods Green add a fragrant top note to biryanis, chai and desserts with floral and citrus highlights. Use whole in infusions or crush for fresh ground aroma.

fields.name: Nora Whole Cloves (Laung)
fields.name_description: Aromatic whole cloves with warm, sweet and peppery notes — used in rice, stews and spiced beverages.
fields.description: Nora Whole Cloves release intense warm and slightly sweet aromas when simmered, making them perfect for biryanis and mulled drinks. Their concentrated profile means a little goes a long way.

fields.name: Orla Black Cardamom (Badi Elaichi)
fields.name_description: Smoky black cardamom pods with bold, camphor-like and smoky notes — suited to robust meat and lentil dishes.
fields.description: Orla Black Cardamom lends deep, smoky, camphoraceous tones to slow-cooked meats and dals, adding umami complexity. Use sparingly to complement rather than overwhelm other spices.

fields.name: Parker Ajwain (Carom Seeds)
fields.name_description: Aromatic ajwain seeds with thyme-like pungency — commonly used in breads, pakoras and digestive masalas.
fields.description: Parker Ajwain seeds impart a warm, slightly bitter, thyme-like flavour that brightens fried snacks and flatbreads. They are often used for digestion-supporting tempering and pickles.

fields.name: Quince Star Anise Whole
fields.name_description: Whole star anise pods offering licorice-like sweetness — used in broths, biryanis and spice blends.
fields.description: Quince Star Anise adds a sweet, aniseed note that deepens soups, broths and braised dishes with gentle licorice nuances. The whole pod is ideal for slow-cook infusions and is removed before serving.

fields.name: Rowan Black Pepper Powder Tellicherry
fields.name_description: Finely ground Tellicherry black pepper known for bold aroma and complex heat — perfect for finishing and rubs.
fields.description: Rowan Tellicherry Pepper Powder provides bold heat and complex fruity notes when freshly ground into sauces and rubs. Its premium grade ensures larger corns and more aromatic oils for deeper flavour.

fields.name: Sable White Pepper Powder
fields.name_description: White pepper powder with clean, sharp heat — preferred in light-coloured sauces and Chinese cooking.
fields.description: Sable White Pepper Powder offers a milder, earthy heat without black specks, making it ideal for cream sauces and delicate soups. Its refined finish blends smoothly for subtle warmth.

fields.name: Talia Saffron Threads (Kesar)
fields.name_description: Premium saffron threads with floral, honeyed aroma and deep colour — used sparingly to perfume rice and desserts.
fields.description: Talia Saffron Threads offer a delicate floral and honeyed bouquet that imbues rice and milk-based desserts with golden colour and refined fragrance. A small pinch delivers pronounced sensory lift to celebratory dishes.

fields.name: Uma Anardana (Dried Pomegranate Seeds)
fields.name_description: Dried anardana seeds offering bright tartness — commonly used to add tang to chutneys and spice mixes.
fields.description: Uma Anardana provides lively, fruity acidity to chaat masalas and marinades while balancing rich, spicy flavours. The seeds can be ground to a tart powder or used whole for texture.

fields.name: Vera Chilli Flakes Crushed
fields.name_description: Crushed red chilli flakes with medium heat and vibrant colour — great for pizzas, pastas and sprinkling.
fields.description: Vera Chilli Flakes add immediate textured heat and bright colour to finished dishes, pizzas and pastas. The coarse crush gives bursts of spice and visual interest when sprinkled as a condiment.

fields.name: Willow Rock Salt (Sendha Namak)
fields.name_description: Coarse rock salt known for pure mineral taste — used in fasting recipes and pickles.
fields.description: Willow Rock Salt offers a clean, mineral-rich seasoning that dissolves slowly, making it ideal for pickles and fasting-specific recipes. Its coarse crystals also add texture when used as a finishing salt.

fields.name: Xander Mixed Pickling Masala
fields.name_description: Robust pickling masala blend with mustard, fenugreek and chilli — developed for long-lasting pickles.
fields.description: Xander Mixed Pickling Masala combines assertive seeds and spices to build layered, shelf-stable pickles and achar. The blend encourages fermentation flavours while adding depth and texture to preserved vegetables.

fields.name: Yonder Tandoori Masala
fields.name_description: Smoky tandoori masala blend with roasted coriander and cumin — tailored for grills and marinades.
fields.description: Yonder Tandoori Masala brings smoky, roasted spice character that crisps and colours marinades for skewers and grilled meats. The balanced blend provides consistent heat and aromatic complexity.

fields.name: Zeal Chaat Masala Powder
fields.name_description: Tangy chaat masala with amchur and roasted cumin — crafted for street-food style snacks and salads.
fields.description: Zeal Chaat Masala Powder provides a bright, tangy finish to salads, fruit chaat and fried snacks with notes of dried mango and roasted cumin. Sprinkle generously to recreate classic street flavours at home.

fields.name: Alpen Panch Phoran Whole Mix
fields.name_description: Traditional Bengali five-spice mix (panch phoran) of mustard, fenugreek, nigella, cumin and fennel — for tempering.
fields.description: Alpen Panch Phoran releases distinctive perfume when tempered in oil, providing unique anise, mustard and earthy notes to vegetable and fish dishes. The whole-mix format keeps seeds intact for popping and crisp tempering.

fields.name: Bento Roasted Cumin Powder (Bhuna Jeera)
fields.name_description: Roasted and ground cumin powder with deep, toasty aroma — adds smoky depth to gravies and snacks.
fields.description: Bento Roasted Cumin Powder develops rich, toasty notes that add a smoky backbone to sauces, raitas and spice rubs. Toasting before grinding concentrates aromatic oils for pronounced flavour.

fields.name: Cerami Curry Leaves Dried
fields.name_description: Sun-dried curry leaves preserving the fresh aroma — used for tempering, chutneys and flavouring rice dishes.
fields.description: Cerami Curry Leaves Dried retain the distinctive herbaceous aroma and provide quick-to-use seasoning for tempering and dals. They rehydrate rapidly in hot oil, releasing classic South-Indian fragrance.

fields.name: Droplet White Sesame Seeds
fields.name_description: Clean white sesame seeds with mild nutty flavour — used for garnishing, tahini and baking.
fields.description: Droplet White Sesame Seeds provide delicate nutty notes when toasted and are ideal for breads, dressings and tahini preparations. Their uniform size and colour make them perfect for consistent garnishing.

fields.name: Evoke Dried Ginger Powder
fields.name_description: Fine dried ginger powder with warm, zesty heat — useful in savory and sweet recipes alike.
fields.description: Evoke Dried Ginger Powder brings bright, zesty warmth to marinades, sweets and beverages while offering longer shelf life than fresh. The fine grind blends seamlessly into rubs and batters.

fields.name: Feast Ajwain Carom Powder
fields.name_description: Ground ajwain powder with concentrated digestive aroma — used in breads and fritters for flavour and tolerance.
fields.description: Feast Ajwain Powder disperses thyme-like pungency evenly through doughs and batter-based snacks for classic regional notes. Its powdered format speeds incorporation while preserving potency.

fields.name: Glide Turmeric & Black Pepper Blend
fields.name_description: A health-focused blend of turmeric and black pepper for enhanced absorption and warming flavour.
fields.description: Glide Turmeric & Black Pepper Blend combines bright turmeric with freshly ground pepper to enhance curcumin uptake and flavour balance. It's convenient for golden beverages and seasoning mixes.

fields.name: Harvest White Sesame Paste (Tahini)
fields.name_description: Creamy tahini-style sesame paste made from roasted white sesame seeds — perfect for dips and dressings.
fields.description: Harvest Tahini offers a smooth, slightly bitter-sweet sesame character that enriches hummus, dressings and sauces. The paste is emulsified for spreadable consistency and easy incorporation.

fields.name: Indigo Black Salt Kala Namak
fields.name_description: Volcanic-style black salt with sulphury tang — used in chaat, raitas and vegan egg substitutes.
fields.description: Indigo Black Salt gives a distinctive sulphurous tang that brightens chutneys and snack mixes while mimicking egg-like aroma in vegan dishes. Use sparingly to accent other seasonings.

fields.name: Juno Mace (Javitri) Whole
fields.name_description: Whole mace blades with sweet, aromatic notes reminiscent of nutmeg — used in biryani, sweets and baking.
fields.description: Juno Mace lends delicate floral spice and warm sweetness to rice dishes and desserts while complementing nutmeg and cloves. Keep whole for infusion and grate fresh for maximum aroma.

fields.name: Keen Dried Mint Flakes
fields.name_description: Intensely green dried mint flakes for raitas, chutneys and garnishing — bright and refreshing.
fields.description: Keen Dried Mint Flakes retain a fresh, cooling lift that brightens yogurt-based raitas, salads and marinades. The flakes rehydrate quickly and distribute evenly in mixes.

fields.name: Luxe Madras Curry Powder
fields.name_description: Robust Madras curry powder blend with roasted chilli and coriander — delivering bold, tangy heat for curries.
fields.description: Luxe Madras Curry Powder balances roasted chilli, coriander and tamarind notes to create assertive curries with layered heat. Use for rich stews and coconut-based gravies where pronounced spice is desired.

fields.name: Mingle Szechuan Peppercorns
fields.name_description: Sichuan (Szechuan) peppercorns with citrusy numbing aroma — used for Sichuan-style cooking and spice blends.
fields.description: Mingle Szechuan Peppercorns deliver a unique citrusy, numbing sensation that elevates Szechuan dishes and fusion recipes. Toast lightly before crushing to unlock the floral-citrus essential oils.

fields.name: Aroma Salted Potato Crisps
fields.name_description: Thinly sliced potatoes, kettle-cooked and lightly salted — crisp and snack-ready.
fields.description: Aroma Salted Potato Crisps are thin, crunchy slices seasoned with sea salt for a clean, satisfying bite. The kettle-cooked method gives irregular crunch and bold texture suited to casual snacking.

fields.name: Basil Multigrain Crackers
fields.name_description: Crisp multigrain crackers with seeds and mild herbs — great with dips or cheese.
fields.description: Basil Multigrain Crackers combine wholegrains and seeds into a crunchy, baked cracker that pairs well with spreads. The subtle herb lift makes them versatile for entertaining or everyday snacking.

fields.name: Crown Butter Cookies
fields.name_description: Buttery shortbread-style cookies baked to a tender crumb — classic teatime treat.
fields.description: Crown Butter Cookies bake to a tender, melt-in-the-mouth texture with a rich butter note that pairs perfectly with tea. Individually wrapped for freshness, they make convenient treats on the go.

fields.name: Delta Spiced Peanuts
fields.name_description: Crunchy roasted peanuts tossed in a spiced coating — crunchy, savory snack.
fields.description: Delta Spiced Peanuts are dry-roasted and seasoned with a balanced spice mix that delivers crunch and warm heat. The robust coating makes them ideal for munching with drinks or as a protein-rich snack.

fields.name: EcoSteel Cheese Sticks
fields.name_description: Oven-baked cheese-flavoured sticks with crisp snap — great for kids and parties.
fields.description: EcoSteel Cheese Sticks deliver a crunchy baked texture with savory cheese notes that children and adults enjoy alike. The lightweight pack makes them a handy lunchbox addition.

fields.name: Fusion Chocolate Digestives
fields.name_description: Crisp digestive biscuits coated with smooth chocolate on one side — balanced sweet-snack.
fields.description: Fusion Chocolate Digestives combine wholesome wheat biscuits with a decadent chocolate coating for a satisfying balance of texture and sweetness. Packaged in a stay-fresh tray, they make an easy pairing for coffee.

fields.name: GrindPro Banana Chips
fields.name_description: Crisp thin-sliced banana chips fried in oil and lightly salted — tropical crunchy snack.
fields.description: GrindPro Banana Chips are expertly fried for an even, long-lasting crunch and a touch of salt to highlight natural sweetness. They pair well with tea or as a portable snack for travel.

fields.name: Hearth Roasted Almonds Honey
fields.name_description: Hand-roasted almonds glazed with a light honey coating — sweet, crunchy nibble.
fields.description: Hearth Roasted Almonds are oven-roasted and gently glazed with honey for a crunchy, sweet finish that complements coffee or dessert plates. The small-batch process preserves crunch and natural almond flavor.

fields.name: Infuse Veggie Sticks
fields.name_description: Baked vegetable sticks made from real vegetable powders — lighter alternative to fried chips.
fields.description: Infuse Veggie Sticks are oven-baked and seasoned for a crunchy, lower-fat snacking option that still delivers savory satisfaction. They offer a colorful plate and pair well with hummus or yogurt dips.

fields.name: Junction Mini Pretzels
fields.name_description: Bite-sized salted pretzels with firm snap — excellent as party nibbles or lunchbox treats.
fields.description: Junction Mini Pretzels are baked to a crisp exterior with a chewy center and a light sprinkling of salt for finishing. Their small size makes them convenient for dipping or mixing into snack mixes.

fields.name: KitchPro Masala Peanuts
fields.name_description: Crispy peanuts coated in tangy masala — classic spicy snack flavour.
fields.description: KitchPro Masala Peanuts provide crunchy texture with a bright, tangy masala coating that pairs well with chilled beverages. They’re roasted for depth and coated to deliver balanced spice and salt.

fields.name: LadleMaster Butter Toffees
fields.name_description: Soft-centred butter toffees with smooth caramel notes — indulgent sweet treat.
fields.description: LadleMaster Butter Toffees feature a soft, buttery centre encased in a glossy caramel shell for a comforting, melt-in-the-mouth experience. Individually wrapped pieces keep portions neat and fresh.

fields.name: Mason Savoury Biscuit Thins
fields.name_description: Crisp thin savory biscuits with herb seasoning — ideal with soups and spreads.
fields.description: Mason Savoury Biscuit Thins bake to a delicate crispness with a subtle herb seasoning that complements cheeses and dips. Their thin profile offers a light crunch without heaviness.

fields.name: Nimble Chocolate Wafer Rolls
fields.name_description: Crisp wafer rolls filled with chocolate cream — light and crunchy dessert snack.
fields.description: Nimble Chocolate Wafer Rolls provide a delicate, flaky bite with a smooth chocolate core that delights as a light dessert or coffee companion. The tubular shape makes them playful and easy to serve.

fields.name: Nora Masala Corn Puffs
fields.name_description: Light corn puffs coated in tangy masala seasoning — airy and flavourful snack.
fields.description: Nora Masala Corn Puffs are airy, crunchy bites dusted in a tangy spice blend for an immediately addictive snack. Their light texture makes them ideal for sharing or casual munching.

fields.name: Orla Honey Oat Cookies
fields.name_description: Soft-baked oat cookies with honey and raisins — wholesome sweet snack.
fields.description: Orla Honey Oat Cookies combine rolled oats, honey and plump raisins for a soft, chewy cookie with natural sweetness. They’re great for breakfast-on-the-go or as an afternoon pick-me-up.

fields.name: Parker Savory Mix Trail
fields.name_description: Roasted savory nut and seed trail mix with spices — balanced crunch and umami notes.
fields.description: Parker Savory Mix Trail brings together roasted almonds, cashews, pumpkin seeds and chickpeas tossed in a savory spice blend for a protein-forward snack. It’s ideal for longer outings or as a more filling nibble.

fields.name: Quince Mini Biscuit Gems
fields.name_description: Small crunchy butter biscuits with colorful sugar tops — nostalgic tea-time classic.
fields.short_description: Mini butter biscuits with sugar tops
fields.description: Quince Mini Biscuit Gems are crisp little butter biscuits topped with a bright sugar dot for playful snacking and kid-friendly treats. Their small size makes sharing and portioning effortless.

fields.name: Rowan Cinnamon Rings
fields.name_description: Crunchy ring biscuits dusted with cinnamon sugar — lightly spiced sweet snack.
fields.description: Rowan Cinnamon Rings offer a crisp, sugar-dusted bite with warm cinnamon aromatics that pair nicely with coffee and milk. The ring shape gives an even bake and an appealing crunch.

fields.name: Sable Choco Chip Cookies
fields.name_description: Classic soft cookies studded with generous chocolate chips — indulgent and chewy.
fields.description: Sable Choco Chip Cookies are soft-baked with pockets of melty chocolate providing comforting sweetness and chew. The generous chip content ensures chocolate in every bite.

fields.name: Talia Baked Cheese Crackers
fields.name_description: Baked crackers with real cheese powder and crisp texture — savory and satisfying.
fields.description: Talia Baked Cheese Crackers balance a crisp bite with an authentic cheese note that enhances snacking and lunchbox mixes. They’re oven-baked for lighter texture and reduced oiliness.

fields.name: Uma Trail Mix Chocolate
fields.name_description: Mixed nuts and dried fruits combined with chocolate pieces — energy-rich sweet-salty snack.
fields.description: Uma Trail Mix Chocolate blends roasted nuts, dried fruits and chocolate chunks to create a balanced energy snack with sweet and salty contrasts. It’s packaged for portability and timed hikes or office munching.

fields.name: Vera Caramel Popcorn
fields.name_description: Light popped corn coated in buttery caramel — sweet and crunchy cinema-style snack.
fields.description: Vera Caramel Popcorn offers a glossy caramel coating over airy popped corn for a sweet, crunchy treat that’s great for sharing. The kernels remain crisp thanks to a careful caramelization process.

fields.name: Willow Savoury Mathri
fields.name_description: Traditional flaky Indian crunchies seasoned with carom and ajwain — tea-time staple.
fields.description: Willow Savoury Mathri bake into layered, flaky rounds infused with aromatic carom seeds for classic Indian teatime enjoyment. They have a long shelf life and pair well with pickles or chai.

fields.name: Xander Pretzel Sticks Salted
fields.name_description: Long salted pretzel sticks with crisp bite — classic bar snack option.
fields.description: Xander Pretzel Sticks are oven-baked for crispness and lightly salted to deliver savory satisfaction in every crunchy snap. They’re easy to portion for parties or packed lunches.

fields.name: Yonder Cheese Ring Biscuits
fields.name_description: Crisp ring-shaped biscuits infused with cheddar flavour — savory snack for sharing.
fields.description: Yonder Cheese Ring Biscuits have a light, crunchy texture and a pronounced cheddar note that enhances snacking and party platters. Their ring shape offers an even bake and fun presentation.

fields.name: Zeal Toasted Corn Crisps
fields.name_description: Crunchy toasted corn crisps with smoky barbecue seasoning — crunchy and bold.
fields.description: Zeal Toasted Corn Crisps are lightly toasted for an extra crunch and dusted with smoky barbecue spices for bold flavour. They’re a satisfying option for savory snack cravings.

fields.name: Alpen Cream Biscuits Vanilla
fields.name_description: Sandwich biscuits with smooth vanilla cream filling — classic sweet biscuit.
fields.description: Alpen Cream Biscuits feature crisp biscuit shells around a smooth vanilla cream center for a timeless sweet snack. The balanced sweetness makes them a family-friendly treat.

fields.name: Bento Cheese Popcorn Cup
fields.name_description: Single-serve cup of cheesy popcorn — convenient portioned snack.
fields.description: Bento Cheese Popcorn Cup offers a ready-to-eat single portion of airy popcorn coated in tangy cheese seasoning for convenience. The cup format is ideal for on-the-go snacking and portion control.
fields.metal: Lidded paper cup with film seal

fields.name: Cerami Mini Doughnuts Sugar
fields.name_description: Mini ring doughnuts dusted in powdered sugar — soft and bite-sized dessert snack.
fields.description: Cerami Mini Doughnuts are soft and airy baked rings dusted with powdered sugar for a light sweet finish. They’re perfect for dessert platters or as a small celebration treat.

fields.name: Droplet Cassava Chips Sea Salt
fields.name_description: Crisp cassava root chips lightly seasoned with sea salt — gluten-free crunchy snack.
fields.description: Droplet Cassava Chips are thinly sliced and fried to a crisp, offering a naturally gluten-free alternative to potato chips with delicate salt seasoning. Their sturdy crunch stands up to dips and salsas.

fields.name: Evoke Rosemary Crackers
fields.name_description: Thin crisp crackers infused with rosemary and sea salt — aromatic and savory.
fields.description: Evoke Rosemary Crackers bake to a delicate crisp and are perfumed with aromatic rosemary and a touch of sea salt, making them elegant partners for cheese boards. Their neutral base supports both sweet and savory toppings.

fields.name: Feast Mini Kaju Katli Bites
fields.name_description: Little diamond-shaped cashew sweets with delicate sugar syrup finish — traditional festive sweet.
fields.description: Feast Mini Kaju Katli Bites are rich, melt-in-the-mouth cashew confections finished with a thin sugar glaze for festive indulgence. Packaged in small servings, they’re perfect for gifting or sharing at celebrations.

fields.name: Glide Peanut Butter Cookies
fields.name_description: Crunchy peanut butter cookies with roasted peanut pieces — nutty cookie classic.
fields.description: Glide Peanut Butter Cookies blend toasted peanut flavour with a crumbly texture and scattered nut pieces for added crunch. They’re satisfying alongside milk or as a portable snack.

fields.name: Harvest Oat Bars Apple Cinnamon
fields.name_description: Soft-baked oat bars with apple pieces and cinnamon — wholesome snack bar.
fields.description: Harvest Oat Bars combine rolled oats, dried apple, and warming cinnamon into a soft, chewy bar ideal for breakfast or mid-day energy. Individually wrapped bars make them convenient for packed lunches.

fields.name: Indigo Wasabi Peas
fields.name_description: Crunchy roasted peas coated in spicy wasabi seasoning — fiery snacking option.
fields.description: Indigo Wasabi Peas offer a fiery hit of heat with a satisfying crunch from roasted green peas coated in bold wasabi seasoning. They’re a lively snack for those who prefer intense spice.

fields.name: Juno Butter Popcorn Tin
fields.name_description: Buttery popcorn packed in a gift-style tin — cinema-style snack with presentable packaging.
fields.description: Juno Butter Popcorn Tin fills a decorative tin with freshly popped, buttery popcorn ideal for gifting or movie nights. The tin preserves crunch and presents attractively for special occasions.

fields.name: Keen Date Rolls with Nuts
fields.name_description: Naturally sweet date rolls rolled with chopped nuts — wholesome energy bites.
fields.description: Keen Date Rolls with Nuts combine sticky dates and chopped nuts for a naturally sweet, energy-dense bite perfect for quick fuel or dessert. The hand-rolled pieces are portion-controlled and travel-friendly.

fields.name: Luxe Sea Salt Caramels
fields.name_description: Handmade sea salt caramels with silky texture — small-batch confection.
fields.description: Luxe Sea Salt Caramels are crafted to a smooth, silky finish and lightly dusted with sea salt to balance sweetness. Individually wrapped pieces make them ideal for sharing or gifting.

fields.name: Mingle Sesame Brittle
fields.name_description: Crunchy sesame brittle made with toasted sesame seeds and caramelised sugar — sweet, nutty crunch.
fields.description: Mingle Sesame Brittle combines toasted sesame seeds with a crisp, caramelised sugar matrix for a crunchy, nutty sweet treat. Breakable pieces are perfect for sharing or topping desserts.

fields.name: Aroma Classic Filter Coffee Powder
fields.name_description: Medium-roast filter coffee powder with bright, nutty notes — crafted for South Indian filter brewing.
fields.description: Aroma Classic Filter Coffee Powder is blended for a balanced cup with roasted nut and caramel hints that shine through slow drip filtration. It produces a steady crema and comforting aroma suitable for daily morning rituals.

fields.name: Basil Darjeeling First Flush Tea
fields.name_description: Light, floral Darjeeling first-flush black tea delivering delicate muscatel notes — prized for its seasonal bright clarity.
fields.description: Basil Darjeeling First Flush Tea brews to a pale amber liquor with floral, grape-like muscatel aromas that refresh the palate. Sip straight or with a light touch of milk to appreciate its delicate complexity.

fields.name: Crown Espresso Dark Roast Beans
fields.name_description: Dark-roast espresso beans with chocolate and smokey undertones — tailored for intense, syrupy shots.
fields.description: Crown Espresso Dark Roast Beans deliver bold, bittersweet chocolate and toasted notes that yield a dense crema in espresso machines. Their roast-forward profile stands up well to milk-based drinks and bold extractions.
fields.metal: Vacuum-sealed valve bag inside cardboard box

fields.name: Delta Masala Chai Tea Bags
fields.name_description: Convenient masala chai tea bags pre-blended with warming spices — brew with milk for a traditional cup.
fields.description: Delta Masala Chai Tea Bags combine robust black tea with ginger, cardamom and cinnamon to deliver a comforting, spiced brew that steeps quickly. Ideal for a quick chai fix when time is limited but flavour is desired.
fields.metal: Cardboard box with foil-wrapped tea bags

fields.name: EcoSteel Instant Coffee Classic
fields.name_description: Soluble instant coffee with balanced aroma and quick dissolve — convenient for immediate cups.
fields.description: EcoSteel Instant Coffee Classic dissolves readily for a smooth, everyday cup with mild roasted notes and consistent flavour. It’s perfect for quick mornings or travel when a brewed extraction isn’t feasible.

fields.name: Fusion Earl Grey Loose Leaf
fields.name_description: Classic Earl Grey black tea scented with bergamot — aromatic and citrus-lifted.
fields.description: Fusion Earl Grey Loose Leaf delivers fragrant citrus top notes from bergamot oil layered over smooth black tea for an elegant afternoon sip. Brew slightly cooler to preserve the aromatic bergamot lift.

fields.name: GrindPro Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate
fields.name_description: Ready-to-brew cold brew concentrate for smooth, low-acidity coffee served cold or diluted.
fields.description: GrindPro Cold Brew Concentrate yields a mellow, chocolatey cold coffee when diluted with water or milk and served over ice. Its concentrated format simplifies preparation for cafes and home use alike.

fields.name: Hearth Assam CTC Strong Tea
fields.name_description: Bold Assam CTC black tea with brisk body and malty backbone — built for milk-forward chai.
fields.description: Hearth Assam CTC Strong Tea brews to a deep, robust cup that cuts through milk and sugar, providing the classic chai foundation. Its brisk, malty character makes it a pantry staple for breakfast blends.
fields.metal: Paper bag with inner foil seal

fields.name: Infuse Jasmine Green Tea
fields.name_description: Delicately scented jasmine green tea with floral aroma — light and refreshing served hot or cold.
fields.description: Infuse Jasmine Green Tea yields a fragrant, pale infusion with subtle floral sweetness that complements light meals and desserts. Brewing gently preserves green tea freshness while releasing the jasmine perfume.
fields.metal: Airtight tin with inner foil sachet

fields.name: Junction French Roast Whole Beans
fields.name_description: Deep French-roast whole beans delivering smoky, bittersweet chocolate notes — ideal for espresso lovers.
fields.description: Junction French Roast Beans are dark-roasted to bring out intense chocolate and smoky flavours that create bold espresso extractions. They pair well with milk for cappuccinos and lattes that require roast presence.

fields.name: KitchPro Chamomile Herbal Tea
fields.name_description: Calming chamomile herbal infusion with floral chamomile sweetness — caffeine-free bedtime cup.
fields.description: KitchPro Chamomile Herbal Tea steeps to a soothing, honeyed floral infusion ideal for relaxation before sleep. Its naturally caffeine-free profile makes it suitable for all ages and quiet evenings.

fields.name: LadleMaster Italian Roast Espresso Pods
fields.name_description: Single-serve espresso pods with dark-roasted blend for concentrated shots — convenient and consistent.
fields.description: LadleMaster Italian Roast Pods are portioned for consistent, full-bodied espresso shots with chocolatey depth and lingering roast notes. They provide quick, mess-free extraction for capsule machines.

fields.name: Mason Rooibos Red Tea
fields.name_description: Naturally caffeine-free rooibos with sweet, nutty undertones — excellent for milk or spiced blends.
fields.description: Mason Rooibos Red Tea brews to a smooth, ruby infusion with toasty, sweet-tangy notes that pair well with milk and honey. Its antioxidant-rich properties make it a soothing alternative to black tea.

fields.name: Nimble Single-Origin Ethiopian Beans
fields.name_description: Light-to-medium roast Ethiopian coffee beans with floral and blueberry notes — great for pour-over.
fields.description: Nimble Ethiopian Beans feature pronounced floral and berry tones that shine in pour-over and filter methods, highlighting origin character. The light roast preserves acidity and aromatic nuances for delicate brews.

fields.name: Nora Peppermint Tea Bags
fields.name_description: Refreshing peppermint infusion with cooling menthol notes — caffeine-free and invigorating.
fields.description: Nora Peppermint Tea Bags steep to a brisk, minty cup perfect for digestion or a refreshing pick-me-up. The bright menthol character makes it an excellent palate cleanser after meals.

fields.name: Orla Breakfast Blend Tea
fields.name_description: Robust breakfast black tea blend crafted for strong, brisk brews that suit milk and sugar.
fields.description: Orla Breakfast Blend Tea offers a full-bodied, brisk cup with malty backbone designed to stand up to milk and honey at breakfast. Its consistent blend delivers reliable strength and color every morning.

fields.name: Parker Vietnamese Robusta Beans
fields.name_description: High-robusta beans delivering powerful body and crema — suited for espresso with bold punch.
fields.description: Parker Vietnamese Robusta Beans provide intense body, heavy crema and pronounced earthy notes ideal for traditional strong espresso shots. Their high-soluble content yields quick extraction and persistent flavour.

fields.name: Quince Lemon Ginger Tea
fields.name_description: Zesty lemon and warming ginger herbal blend — bright and comforting infusion.
fields.description: Quince Lemon Ginger Tea marries citrus brightness with warming ginger heat for an invigorating, soothing cup that aids digestion. The teabags are portioned for reliable strength and quick steeping.

fields.name: Rowan Organic Green Coffee Beans
fields.name_description: Unroasted green coffee beans for home roasting and experimentation — fresh origin lots.
fields.description: Rowan Organic Green Beans allow home roasters and micro-roasteries to craft custom roast profiles, preserving origin character until roast time. Store cool and dry to maintain green bean quality prior to roasting.
fields.metal: Jute bag with inner foil lining

fields.name: Sable Vanilla Rooibos Blend
fields.name_description: Rooibos blended with natural vanilla for sweet, caffeine-free comfort — smooth and aromatic.
fields.description: Sable Vanilla Rooibos Blend offers a creamy, dessert-like cup without caffeine, combining rooibos base with warm vanilla tones. It steeps to a mellow, naturally sweet infusion suitable day or night.

fields.name: Talia Cold Brew Tea Matcha Ready
fields.name_description: Ready-to-drink matcha cold brew with creamy mouthfeel — energizing and smooth.
fields.description: Talia Cold Brew Matcha is whisked and chilled for a vegetal, umami-rich green tea experience with a naturally creamy texture. The bottled format is convenient for on-the-go energy and ceremonial matcha fans alike.

fields.name: Uma Kenyan AA Medium Roast
fields.name_description: Medium-roast Kenyan coffee beans with bright acidity and blackcurrant notes — vibrant single-origin cup.
fields.description: Uma Kenyan AA Beans present lively acidity and juicy berry notes that bloom in pour-over and drip methods, delivering a lively, complex cup. The medium roast balances origin sweetness with roast clarity.
fields.metal: Foil valve bag with resealable zipper

fields.name: Vera Organic Tulsi Green Tea
fields.name_description: Tulsi (holy basil) blended with green tea for herbal uplift and gentle antioxidants.
fields.description: Vera Organic Tulsi Green Tea harmonises adaptogenic tulsi with delicate green tea leaves to create a calming yet stimulating infusion. It’s suitable for daily wellness routines and mindful tea moments.

fields.name: Willow Hazelnut Flavoured Coffee
fields.name_description: Smooth medium-roast coffee infused with natural hazelnut aroma — dessert-like sip option.
fields.description: Willow Hazelnut Coffee combines a soft roast with toasted hazelnut notes for a warming, slightly sweet cup that complements milk. It’s an approachable flavoured choice for latte enthusiasts.

fields.name: Xander Breakfast Instant Coffee Sachets
fields.name_description: Single-serve instant coffee sachets for convenient on-the-go cups — consistent and quick to prepare.
fields.description: Xander Instant Coffee Sachets dissolve instantly in hot water for a straightforward cup with light roast character and reliable strength. The portioned format helps control dosage and freshness when travelling.

fields.name: Yonder Assam Orthodox Leaf Tea
fields.name_description: Orthodox whole-leaf Assam tea with robust maltiness and amber liquor — classic breakfast option.
fields.description: Yonder Assam Orthodox Tea brews to a strong, malty cup with deep color and full mouthfeel that pairs well with milk and sugar. Its whole-leaf format preserves larger leaf integrity and nuanced flavour.

fields.name: Zeal Colombian Supremo Beans
fields.name_description: Medium-roast Colombian beans with caramel sweetness and balanced acidity — versatile for multiple brew methods.
fields.description: Zeal Colombian Supremo Beans deliver caramel and citrus notes with a round body suited to both espresso and filter brewing. Their medium roast highlights origin sweetness while maintaining clarity.

fields.name: Alpen Earl Grey Tea Bags Supreme
fields.name_description: Premium Earl Grey teabags using whole-leaf black tea scented with natural bergamot — refined and fragrant.
fields.description: Alpen Earl Grey Tea Bags deliver a bright bergamot aroma atop a refined black tea base for a classic, balanced cup. Individually wrapped teabags ensure freshness and convenient brewing anywhere.

fields.name: Bento Turkish Instant Coffee
fields.name_description: Fine-ground instant coffee inspired by Turkish style — quick to dissolve for bold cups.
fields.description: Bento Turkish Instant Coffee recreates the strong, aromatic profile of traditional Turkish brews with a quick-dissolve convenience. It’s designed for those who favour intense flavour with minimal preparation.

fields.name: Cerami Oolong Tieguanyin
fields.name_description: Floral, lightly oxidized oolong with orchid-like fragrance — complex and aromatic.
fields.description: Cerami Tieguanyin Oolong brews to a fragrant, floral infusion with a lingering sweetness and gentle mineral finish. It rewards multiple infusions, revealing evolving aromatic layers over successive brews.

fields.name: Droplet Irish Breakfast Tea
fields.name_description: Robust black tea blend crafted for strong, malty cups — ideal with milk and sugar.
fields.description: Droplet Irish Breakfast Tea blends strong-leaf Assam and Ceylon for a full-bodied, malty brew that is perfect for a hearty morning cup. Its brisk profile makes it a favorite for milk-forward preparations.

fields.name: Evoke Colombian Decaf Beans
fields.name_description: Swiss-water processed decaffeinated beans retaining origin sweetness and low acidity.
fields.description: Evoke Colombian Decaf Beans undergo gentle Swiss-water decaffeination to preserve the natural sweetness and origin clarity without caffeine. They work well in evening espresso or filter brews when caffeine avoidance is desired.

fields.name: Feast Spiced Rooibos Chai
fields.name_description: Rooibos-based chai blend with cinnamon, ginger and cloves — caffeine-free warming cup.
fields.description: Feast Spiced Rooibos Chai blends rooibos with chai spices to produce a naturally caffeine-free, warming brew that suits milk addition and sweetening. Its spice-forward nature provides comfort without caffeine stimulation.
fields.metal: Airtight tin with inner foil sachet

fields.name: Glide Sticky Toffee Latte Mix
fields.name_description: Instant latte mix with sticky toffee flavour for quick indulgent coffee moments.
fields.description: Glide Sticky Toffee Latte Mix dissolves into hot milk for a quick, dessert-like latte with caramel and toffee notes. Its portioned sachets make it convenient for office or travel indulgence.

fields.name: Harvest Lemon Myrtle Tea
fields.name_description: Australian lemon myrtle herbal infusion with bright citrus aroma — naturally caffeine-free.
fields.short_description: Lemon myrtle herbal tea loose leaf
fields.description: Harvest Lemon Myrtle Tea brews to a fragrant, lemony cup that is refreshing both hot and iced, offering a caffeine-free citrus boost. Its pure botanical character makes it a lively alternative to conventional teas.

fields.name: Indigo Flat White Espresso Blend
fields.name_description: Balanced medium-roast espresso blend tailored for velvety milk drinks and smooth microfoam.
fields.description: Indigo Flat White Blend is formulated to produce sweet, chocolatey notes and even extraction that pairs perfectly with steamed milk for lattes and flat whites. The roast profile ensures consistent texture and mouthfeel.

fields.name: Juno Maple Pecan Flavoured Coffee
fields.name_description: Maple and pecan flavored ground coffee for sweet, nutty brewed cups — comforting and aromatic.
fields.description: Juno Maple Pecan Coffee brings a warm, nutty-sweet character to drip or French press brewing, evoking bakery notes in every sip. Its flavored profile is ideal for cozy mornings and dessert-style drinks.

fields.name: Keen Genmaicha Green Tea
fields.name_description: Japanese genmaicha combining green tea and toasted rice for nutty, toasty notes — light and savory.
fields.short_description: Genmaicha green tea with toasted rice
fields.description: Keen Genmaicha pairs vegetal green tea with popcorn-like toasted rice for a comforting, umami-tinged infusion that suits meals and snacks. Its mild profile makes it accessible for everyday drinking.

fields.name: Luxe Sumatran Peaberry Beans
fields.name_description: Single-origin Sumatran peaberry beans with earthy, spicy depth and syrupy body — complex and intense.
fields.description: Luxe Sumatran Peaberry Beans offer dense body, earthy spices and subtle herbal notes that perform well in espresso and French press. Their unique peaberry formation concentrates sugars and acids for distinct cup character.

fields.name: Mingle Spiced Cold Brew Tea Concentrate
fields.name_description: Concentrated spiced tea for cold-brew preparations — mix with water or milk for instant iced chai.
fields.description: Mingle Spiced Cold Brew Concentrate combines black tea with cinnamon, cardamom and clove for an aromatic iced chai when diluted. The concentrated format simplifies iced tea service and cafe-style beverages at home.

fields.name: Alpine Fresh Whole Milk
fields.name_description: Fresh whole milk from pasture-raised cows — creamy and rich in natural goodness.
fields.description: Alpine Fresh Whole Milk is pasteurised to retain natural creaminess and a full-bodied mouthfeel, ideal for daily drinking and cereal. Sourced from small farms, it delivers consistent freshness in every pour.

fields.name: Butterfield Unsalted Butter
fields.name_description: Creamy churned unsalted butter with a smooth, spreadable texture.
fields.description: Butterfield Unsalted Butter is churned for a silky texture and clean dairy flavour that enhances baking and cooking. It’s packaged to preserve aroma and is ideal for delicate sauces and pastries.

fields.name: Creamery Greek Yogurt
fields.name_description: Thick strained Greek-style yogurt — tangy, creamy, protein-rich.
fields.description: Creamery Greek Yogurt is slow-strained for a dense, velvety texture and a bright tang that pairs well with fruit or granola. It’s high in protein and crafted for a clean, natural taste.

fields.name: Daisy Farm Paneer Cubes
fields.name_description: Fresh Indian cottage cheese, firm and milky — perfect for curries and grills.
fields.description: Daisy Farm Paneer Cubes are hand-pressed from fresh curds to a firm, sliceable texture that absorbs marinades and sauces well. Packaged to preserve moisture and mild dairy sweetness.

fields.name: Sunrise Sourdough Loaf
fields.name_description: Handmade sourdough loaf with a tangy crumb and crisp crust.
fields.description: Sunrise Sourdough Loaf is naturally leavened and baked to a crackly crust with a slightly tangy interior — excellent for toasting or sandwiches. Each loaf is slow-fermented for depth of flavour.

fields.name: Brioche Royale Rolls
fields.name_description: Buttery brioche rolls with a tender, pillowy crumb — perfect for burgers and breakfast.
fields.description: Brioche Royale Rolls are enriched with butter and eggs to produce a soft, golden crumb and subtle sweetness. Individually shaped for consistent texture and finished with a shiny top.

fields.name: Velvet Cream Mascarpone
fields.name_description: Silky Italian-style mascarpone cream — rich, smooth and spreadable.
fields.description: Velvet Cream Mascarpone is luxuriously smooth and slightly sweet, ideal for desserts like tiramisu or as a finishing cream. Made from high-quality cream for a velvety mouthfeel.

fields.name: Harvest Multigrain Loaf
fields.name_description: Soft sandwich loaf packed with seeds and whole grains — hearty and wholesome.
fields.description: Harvest Multigrain Loaf blends wheat flours with seeds and grains for a nutty flavour and hearty texture. It toasts well and makes a satisfying base for savory or sweet toppings.

fields.name: Moonlight Croissants (Butter)
fields.name_description: Classic laminated butter croissants — flaky, layered and golden.
fields.description: Moonlight Croissants are made with layers of butter and dough that produce a crisp exterior and airy interior. Serve warm for the best flake and buttery aroma.

fields.name: CreamTop Whipped Cream
fields.name_description: Stabilised whipped cream — light, airy and ready to pipe.
fields.description: CreamTop Whipped Cream is aerated to a light, stable texture that holds peaks for decorating desserts and beverages. It’s smooth and lightly sweetened for versatility.

fields.name: GoldBarn Cheddar Slice
fields.name_description: Mild cheddar cheese, pre-sliced for convenience — melty and versatile.
fields.description: GoldBarn Cheddar Slice melts evenly and offers a balanced mild cheddar flavour suitable for sandwiches, burgers, and melts. Individually separated slices make portioning simple.

fields.name: Olivewood Focaccia
fields.name_description: Herbed focaccia with olive oil and rosemary — airy and aromatic.
fields.description: Olivewood Focaccia is brushed with extra virgin olive oil and studded with rosemary for an open crumb and fragrant bite. It’s a great companion for soups, salads, or antipasti.

fields.name: Velvet Fromage Cream Cheese
fields.name_description: Soft, spreadable cream cheese with a clean, mild flavor.
fields.description: Velvet Fromage Cream Cheese spreads easily and brings a mild, tangy dairy note to bagels, cakes, and frostings. It’s smooth and slightly tang-forward for balanced flavour.

fields.name: SunnyDale Buttermilk
fields.name_description: Lightly cultured buttermilk — tangy and great for baking.
fields.description: SunnyDale Buttermilk is gently cultured to offer a tangy acidity that improves batter lift and flavour in pancakes and cakes. It’s smooth and slightly thick for baking or drinking.

fields.name: MorningGlaze Danish (Almond)
fields.name_description: Flaky Danish pastry filled with almond cream and flaked almonds.
fields.description: MorningGlaze Danish combines layers of laminated pastry with a rich almond frangipane and crunchy almond flakes on top, delivering a balanced sweetness and buttery flake.

fields.name: Cottage Crest Ricotta
fields.name_description: Light, slightly grainy ricotta — mild and versatile for savory and sweet dishes.
fields.description: Cottage Crest Ricotta is gently drained for a soft, slightly grainy texture that works well in lasagnas, desserts, and fillings. The fresh dairy flavour is subtle and adaptable.

fields.name: StoneBridge Baguette
fields.name_description: Crisp French-style baguette — crackling crust and airy crumb.
fields.description: StoneBridge Baguette is fermented for flavour and baked until the crust is crisp and the crumb remains airy. Ideal for sandwiches, bruschetta, or tearing alongside soups.

fields.name: Harvest Blueberry Muffins
fields.name_description: Moist muffins studded with juicy blueberries and a crunchy sugar top.
fields.description: Harvest Blueberry Muffins are tender and moist with bursts of blueberry throughout and a light sugar crust for contrast. Individually portioned for grab-and-go enjoyment.

fields.name: PureCream Sour Cream
fields.name_description: Smooth sour cream with balanced tang — ideal for dips and baking.
fields.description: PureCream Sour Cream offers a creamy body with a pleasant tang that brightens dips, dressings, and baked dishes. It’s smooth and spreadable for versatile use.

fields.name: Granary Seeded Bagels
fields.name_description: Chewy bagels topped with mixed seeds — hearty and textured.
fields.description: Granary Seeded Bagels are boiled then baked to achieve a glossy, chewy exterior with a nutty seed topping that adds crunch and flavour to breakfast sandwiches.

fields.name: SilkRoad Cottage Cheese
fields.name_description: Creamy cottage cheese curds — mild and slightly tangy.
fields.description: SilkRoad Cottage Cheese features tender curds suspended in a creamy base, providing a mild tang and pleasant texture for salads, desserts, and snacks.

fields.name: MorningLoaf Cinnamon Swirl
fields.name_description: Soft loaf with a cinnamon-sugar swirl and tender crumb.
fields.description: MorningLoaf Cinnamon Swirl bakes to a soft, fragrant crumb with ribbons of cinnamon sugar that caramelise slightly for a comforting, lightly spiced sliceable bread.

fields.name: Farmstead Gouda Wedge
fields.name_description: Semi-hard gouda with a creamy, slightly nutty profile.
fields.description: Farmstead Gouda Wedge develops a smooth, nutty flavour with subtle caramel notes as it ages, offering a satisfying slice for cheese boards and melting applications.

fields.name: Cocoa Bliss Chocolate Cake Slice
fields.name_description: Decadent chocolate cake slice with velvety ganache topping.
fields.description: Cocoa Bliss Chocolate Cake Slice layers moist chocolate sponge with rich ganache for an indulgent single-serve dessert. Carefully portioned for freshness and convenience.

fields.name: Velvet Bun Chocolate Donuts
fields.name_description: Soft ring donuts glazed with chocolate — tender and sweet.
fields.description: Velvet Bun Chocolate Donuts are light and pillowy with a glossy chocolate glaze that adds a sweet finish. These are made fresh and ideal for sharing or treating.

fields.name: Heritage Kefir Drink
fields.name_description: Probiotic-rich kefir for digestive health and tangy refreshment.
fields.description: Heritage Kefir Drink is fermented with live cultures to deliver a tangy, effervescent beverage rich in probiotics and nutrients — great for gut health and as a refreshing snack.

fields.name: Olive & Thyme Focaccia Squares
fields.name_description: Individual focaccia squares topped with olives and thyme — savoury and tender.
fields.description: Olive & Thyme Focaccia Squares are infused with olive oil and studded with olives for a fragrant, soft-centred bread that pairs well with cheeses and soups.

fields.name: Velvet Milk Chocolate Spread
fields.name_description: Creamy milk-chocolate spread made with real dairy — smooth and spreadable.
fields.description: Velvet Milk Chocolate Spread blends real milk solids and cocoa to create a spreadable, creamy chocolate ideal for toast, pastries, and desserts. It’s smooth with a mild cocoa finish.

fields.name: Sunrise Eggless Cupcakes (Vanilla)
fields.name_description: Light vanilla cupcakes made without eggs — soft crumb and vanilla aroma.
fields.description: Sunrise Eggless Cupcakes offer a tender crumb and delicate vanilla flavour suitable for those avoiding eggs. Topped with a light buttercream for added sweetness.

fields.name: Farmhouse Smoked Ricotta
fields.name_description: Lightly smoked ricotta for a subtle smoky dimension in dishes.
fields.description: Farmhouse Smoked Ricotta brings a gentle smoke note to the fresh, creamy ricotta base — excellent for salads, crostini, or pasta fillings that need a mild smoky lift.

fields.name: Seed & Grain Crackers
fields.name_description: Thin crisp crackers with a medley of seeds — perfect with cheeses.
fields.description: Seed & Grain Crackers are thin and brittle with toasted seeds for crunch and nutty flavour, pairing beautifully with soft cheeses or dips for elegant snacking.

fields.name: LactoPro Drinking Yogurt (Mango)
fields.name_description: Smooth drinking yogurt blended with real mango purée — fruity and refreshing.
fields.description: LactoPro Drinking Yogurt blends probiotic yogurt with ripe mango purée to create a smooth, drinkable snack that’s both fruity and tangy — great on the go.

fields.name: CountryLoaf Multiseed Flatbread
fields.name_description: Thin, bake-style flatbread seeded with flax and sunflower seeds.
fields.description: CountryLoaf Multiseed Flatbread offers a crisp, thin base speckled with seeds for added texture — useful for wraps, dips, or as a crunchy base for toppings.

fields.name: Indigo Blueberry Cream Cheese
fields.name_description: Lightly sweetened cream cheese swirled with blueberry compote.
fields.description: Indigo Blueberry Cream Cheese blends smooth cream cheese with ribbons of blueberry compote for a fruity spread that complements bagels and pastries.

fields.name: Maple Pecan Danish
fields.name_description: Buttery laminated pastry filled with maple and crunchy pecans.
fields.description: Maple Pecan Danish features layers of flaky pastry encasing a sweet maple filling topped with toasted pecans for texture and a warm, caramel-like flavour.

fields.name: Cottage Loaf Rustic Rye
fields.name_description: Dense rye loaf with a rich malty aroma and hearty crumb.
fields.description: Cottage Loaf Rustic Rye uses a blend of rye flours to produce a deep, malty flavour and a slightly dense crumb that pairs well with strong cheeses and smoked meats.

fields.name: GoldenSlice Almond Butter
fields.name_description: Creamy almond butter made from roasted almonds — natural and spreadable.
fields.description: GoldenSlice Almond Butter is stone-milled from roasted almonds for a creamy texture and pure nutty flavour — great on toast, in smoothies, or baking.

fields.name: Sunbeam Custard Creams
fields.name_description: Silky ready-to-eat custard in a convenient cup — smooth and sweet.
fields.description: Sunbeam Custard Creams provide a smooth, creamy vanilla custard texture that’s ready to enjoy as a dessert or snack. The portion cup keeps servings tidy and fresh.
fields.metal: Lidded plastic cup with film seal

fields.name: Fermata Brie Wheel
fields.name_description: Soft-ripened brie with a creamy interior and delicate flavour.
fields.description: Fermata Brie Wheel ripens to a buttery, creamy centre beneath a thin white rind, offering mild mushroomy notes and a luxurious texture perfect for spreading on crackers.
fields.metal: Waxed paper wrap with cardboard sleeve

fields.name: MilkyWay Frozen Parfait
fields.name_description: Layered frozen dairy parfait with fruit compote and crunchy granola.
fields.description: MilkyWay Frozen Parfait balances creamy frozen dairy layers with fruit compote and a crunchy granola topping for texture contrast — a chilled dessert with layers of flavour.

fields.name: Emberfall
fields.name_description: A sweeping novel of memory and small-town secrets, where the past refuses to stay buried.
fields.short_description: Literary mystery about memory and legacy
fields.description: Emberfall traces a protagonist's return to a coastal town to confront family secrets and the fragile ways memory reshapes truth. Lyrical prose and slow-building suspense make this a page-turner for readers who savour atmosphere.

fields.name: The Clockmaker's Daughter
fields.name_description: A generational novel stitched from letters, lost objects and the pulse of an old city.
fields.description: The Clockmaker's Daughter weaves found letters and artifacts into a tender portrait of love, art and the small betrayals that haunt families. The novel's structure rewards close readers with layered reveals.

fields.name: Paper Lanterns at Dawn
fields.name_description: A tender coming-of-age story set against a city that never sleeps.
fields.description: Paper Lanterns at Dawn follows a young protagonist navigating love, loss and the small rituals that bind communities together. Quiet, observant scenes and warm characterization carry the emotional weight.

fields.name: The Last Lighthouse Keeper
fields.name_description: An atmospheric tale of solitude, storm, and the sea's patient memory.
fields.description: The Last Lighthouse Keeper explores one man's vigil at the edge of the world when a wrecked stranger arrives with a dangerous secret. The novel blends quiet domestic detail with the violent beauty of the ocean.

fields.name: Neon Orchard
fields.name_description: A speculative fable where technology and folklore collide beneath neon skies.
fields.short_description: Speculative fiction blending folklore and tech
fields.description: Neon Orchard imagines a near-future town where old myths find new code and residents barter memory for convenience. Sharp, inventive imagery and humane stakes make it an engaging speculative read.

fields.name: A River Between Rooms
fields.name_description: Interlocking stories about neighbors connected by a narrow river and older debts.
fields.short_description: Linked short-story collection with a common place
fields.description: A River Between Rooms gathers linked stories whose characters overlap in surprising ways, revealing how choices ripple across years. The prose is economical and observant, rewarding rereads.

fields.name: The Cartographer's Secret
fields.name_description: A literary thriller in which maps hide the truth and one woman decodes the past.
fields.short_description: Thriller about secrets hidden in maps
fields.description: The Cartographer's Secret blends historical puzzle and present-day suspense as a researcher uncovers a mapmaker's erased work. The plot balances scholarly intrigue and human urgency.

fields.name: Glass & Ash
fields.name_description: A quiet novel of love and ruin set in an industrial town reshaped by history.
fields.short_description: Novel of love, industry, and personal ruin
fields.description: Glass & Ash follows two families across three generations as factories close and communities reinvent themselves. Richly drawn characters and melancholic atmosphere mark this compassionate novel.

fields.name: The Ninth Garden
fields.name_description: A lyrical fantasy where hidden gardens hold the world’s forgotten stories.
fields.description: The Ninth Garden invites readers into a lush, imaginative landscape where each secret garden preserves a lost tale. The novel is rich in sensory detail and quiet magic.

fields.name: Starlit Alleyways
fields.name_description: An urban fable about serendipity and the lives that cross beneath city lights.
fields.short_description: Short novel of intersecting urban lives
fields.description: Starlit Alleyways follows multiple characters whose small encounters catalyse major life shifts. Poetic yet grounded, it celebrates the accidental kindnesses that change destinies.

fields.name: The Invisible Orphanage
fields.name_description: A haunting novel where abandoned places keep their own memories and ghosts.
fields.short_description: Haunting literary novel with gothic tones
fields.description: The Invisible Orphanage charts a caretaker's attempts to catalogue forgotten children’s belongings, only to discover traces of lives that still linger. Melancholy and tender, it explores memory's ethics.

fields.name: A Folded Map of Us
fields.name_description: A tender romance told in postcards, photos and marginalia.
fields.short_description: Epistolary romance of two lives intertwined
fields.description: A Folded Map of Us uses postcards and marginal notes to reveal a long-distance relationship that survives distance and reinvention. The structure underscores how stories accumulate meaning over time.

fields.name: The Orchard Thief
fields.name_description: A taut thriller about a missing heirloom and the quiet thief who takes it.
fields.description: The Orchard Thief peels back the polite face of a rural community after an heirloom vanishes, revealing resentments that simmer beneath. Tightly plotted, the novel ratchets suspense while exploring class and memory.

fields.name: Moon & Morse
fields.name_description: A witty caper where two unlikely friends decode a vanished composer’s score.
fields.short_description: Light-hearted caper about a musical mystery
fields.description: Moon & Morse pairs an amateur sleuth and a retired musician in a search for a missing composition, balancing humour with affectionate insights into art and aging. Fast-paced and charming.

fields.name: The Weight of Paper Boats
fields.name_description: A melancholic novel about childhood pacts and the secrets kept beneath rivers.
fields.short_description: Poignant novel about childhood and secrets
fields.description: The Weight of Paper Boats revisits a coastal town where three friends made a pact, and how the ripples of that promise follow them into adulthood. Quietly devastating and beautifully rendered.

fields.name: The Glass Key
fields.name_description: A noir-tinged tale of favors, betrayals and the small currency of promises.
fields.short_description: Literary noir exploring power and loyalty
fields.description: The Glass Key navigates city politics and private loyalties as a fixer becomes entangled in a mayoral scandal. Razor-sharp dialogue and moral ambiguity drive the narrative.

fields.name: The Paper Birds
fields.name_description: A lyrical novella about loss, art and the small objects that tether us to people.
fields.short_description: Lyrical novella about grief and art
fields.description: The Paper Birds is a compact, lyrical story following an artist’s attempt to catalog objects left by a loved one, discovering tenderness and restraint in the process. Poetic and concise.

fields.name: The Harbor of Lost Names
fields.name_description: A gripping family drama where names, debts and old maps converge.
fields.short_description: Family drama with a mystery at its heart
fields.description: The Harbor of Lost Names centers on a sibling's return after a parent's death and the discovery of an old ledger that rewrites family history. Intense, emotionally exact and surprising.

fields.name: Quiet Atlas
fields.name_description: An introspective novel of travel, memory, and the routes we take to become ourselves.
fields.description: Quiet Atlas follows a cartographer who maps forgotten routes and, in doing so, maps her own past. Sparse, reflective prose makes this a contemplative and rewarding read.

fields.name: The Paper Gardeners
fields.name_description: A warm and witty novel about community gardens, rivalries and second chances.
fields.short_description: Charming novel about community and renewal
fields.description: The Paper Gardeners charts how a neglected lot becomes a shared project, drawing together unlikely neighbours and forgotten stories. Humorous, humane and comforting.

fields.name: The Weight of Ink
fields.name_description: A novel about books, the archivists who love them and histories we refuse to lose.
fields.description: The Weight of Ink follows an archivist racing to preserve fragile documents while confronting the ethical costs of storytelling. Dense with bookish delights and intellectual curiosity.

fields.name: The Garden of Ordinary Things
fields.name_description: A quiet portrait of domestic life, where ordinary days reveal unexpected depth.
fields.description: The Garden of Ordinary Things lingers on the small rituals that shape daily life, mining dignity and wonder from otherwise ordinary scenes. Gentle, precise and deeply human.

fields.name: The Night Cartographer
fields.name_description: A darkly imaginative novel where maps chart more than geography — they chart longing.
fields.short_description: Surreal novel about maps and desire
fields.description: The Night Cartographer blends surreal imagery with human longing as a mapmaker charts landscapes that echo inner lives. Unsettling and beautiful, it rewards readers who favour associative storytelling.

fields.name: Cold Tea & Old Letters
fields.name_description: A reflective novel about regret, small mercies and the letters we never send.
fields.short_description: Reflective novel about regret and reconciliation
fields.description: Cold Tea & Old Letters centers a woman returning to read a trove of letters, each one exposing a missed kindness or lost chance. The writing is tender and quietly precise.

fields.name: The Sparrow's Ledger
fields.name_description: A novel where found ledgers reveal the secret histories of a small port town.
fields.description: The Sparrow's Ledger unspools mysteries hidden inside a battered ledger, uncovering lives that history almost erased. It pairs forensic curiosity with human tenderness.

fields.name: Paper Moons
fields.name_description: A gentle romance that unfolds in the slow light of seaside afternoons.
fields.description: Paper Moons follows two people mending from past losses who find solace in small seaside rituals. The novel privileges feeling and small domestic pleasures over dramatic turns.

fields.name: The Hollow of Stars
fields.name_description: A cosmic-tinged family saga that links grief to the night sky.
fields.description: The Hollow of Stars uses night-sky metaphors to explore how families hold grief and hope across generations. Expansive in theme yet intimate in voice.

fields.name: The Quiet Violins
fields.name_description: A novel about music teachers, rivals and the soft competitions of small conservatories.
fields.short_description: Domestic literary novel set in music schools
fields.description: The Quiet Violins chronicles the professional rivalries and private hopes inside a conservatory, balancing sharp observation with affectionate detail. Rich character work drives the narrative.

fields.name: The Lost Orchard
fields.name_description: A melancholic mystery where fruit trees and family secrets entwine.
fields.short_description: Rural mystery about inheritance and memory
fields.description: The Lost Orchard tracks a family's return to an ancestral plot of land and the quiet reckonings that follow, as old betrayals surface among the trees. Earthy and emotionally grounded.

fields.name: The Glass House Letters
fields.name_description: A suspenseful novel told through found letters and the people who guard them.
fields.short_description: Suspense novel built around found correspondence
fields.description: The Glass House Letters pieces together a family's unraveling through letters discovered in a demolition-bound house, mixing domestic detail with rising dread. Tightly wound and atmospheric.

fields.name: The Nameless City
fields.name_description: A dense, city-based novel that treats streets as characters and alleys as memory.
fields.short_description: Urban novel focusing on place as character
fields.description: The Nameless City maps a metropolis through its residents' small rituals, exploring how place shapes identity in gentle, surprising ways. Ambitious in scope and attentive to detail.

fields.name: A Small Fire
fields.name_description: A compact, intense story of desire and destructive choices.
fields.description: A Small Fire packs emotional intensity into a short frame, following a brief entanglement that leaves lasting consequences. Economical prose with a fierce emotional core.

fields.name: The Silent Orchard
fields.name_description: A thoughtful novel about silence, memory and the textures of rural life.
fields.short_description: Quiet novel exploring silence and memory
fields.description: The Silent Orchard moves at a reflective pace, excavating a community’s unspoken histories and the slow work of forgiveness. The prose is tactile and deeply humane.

fields.name: Birdsong at Dusk
fields.name_description: A tender exploration of aging, memory and the small joys that persist.
fields.short_description: Tender novel about aging and memory
fields.description: Birdsong at Dusk follows an aging couple navigating diminishing faculties and rediscovering old pleasures. It’s quiet, generous and unexpectedly uplifting.

fields.name: The Lost Telegraph
fields.name_description: A historical novel about signals, secrets and messages that cross oceans.
fields.short_description: Historical novel about communication and secrecy
fields.description: The Lost Telegraph interlaces voices across time as telegraphs and coded messages alter destinies. Evocative period detail and a strong sense of place characterise this ambitious story.

fields.name: Salt & Silk
fields.name_description: A luminous novel of migration, family recipes and remade identities.
fields.short_description: Migration story threaded with food and memory
fields.description: Salt & Silk follows a family across continents as recipes and rituals preserve a sense of home. The writing is sensory, with careful attention to taste and memory.

fields.name: The Weight of Snow
fields.name_description: A stark winter novel where the weather presses secrets to the surface.
fields.description: The Weight of Snow traps characters together during a prolonged storm, forcing reckonings that had been politely postponed. Tense and tightly observed, it feels cinematic in scope.

fields.name: The Last Stationery Shop
fields.name_description: A warm, nostalgic novel about the shopkeeper who remembers everyone by name.
fields.short_description: Nostalgic novel about a community shop
fields.description: The Last Stationery Shop centres on a beloved shop that becomes a repository for town stories, small mercies and gentle reckonings. Comforting, witty and heartfelt.

fields.name: Field Notes from the Edge
fields.name_description: A collection of linked stories about borders, literal and emotional.
fields.short_description: Linked stories exploring borders and belonging
fields.description: Field Notes from the Edge assembles linked narratives about people living on thresholds, questioning borders and the meaning of home. Sharp, humane and quietly provocative.

fields.name: The Song of Small Things
fields.name_description: An intimate novel celebrating the tiny rituals that make up a life.
fields.description: The Song of Small Things finds profundity in domestic details — the making of tea, a well-thumbed book, the cadence of conversation — assembling a portrait of a life lived with care. Gentle, precise and quietly luminous.

fields.name: Atlas of Forgotten Places
fields.name_description: A richly illustrated guide to lost towns, abandoned parks and overlooked corners of the world.
fields.description: Atlas of Forgotten Places pairs archival photography with short essays that explore the histories of once-vibrant locales now left to silence. Each entry balances historical context with evocative storytelling for curious readers.

fields.name: How Cities Learn
fields.name_description: An urbanist’s study of how cities adapt, fail and regenerate over time.
fields.short_description: Study of urban adaptation and design
fields.description: How Cities Learn analyses successful and failed urban interventions across continents, offering practical lessons for planners and civic leaders. Clear case studies make complex urban theory accessible.

fields.name: A Brief Guide to Deep Work
fields.name_description: Strategies for focus, concentration and meaningful output in a distracted world.
fields.short_description: Practical book on focus and productivity
fields.description: A Brief Guide to Deep Work offers actionable methods to cultivate focused attention and protect creative time. Short chapters and exercises suit readers wanting immediate, aplicable change.

fields.name: The Botanist's Notebook
fields.name_description: Field observations and practical notes for amateur and professional botanists.
fields.description: The Botanist's Notebook blends concise species profiles with space for field notes, offering both reference and a practical companion for outdoor observation and study.

fields.name: Voices from the River
fields.name_description: Oral histories collected from riverside communities documenting change and resilience.
fields.short_description: Collected oral histories of river communities
fields.description: Voices from the River gathers first-person stories documenting ecological change, livelihoods and cultural resilience, privileging local perspective over outside analysis.

fields.name: The Science of Everyday Things
fields.name_description: Accessible explanations of the physics and chemistry behind daily objects.
fields.description: The Science of Everyday Things demystifies common items and occurrences, using approachable experiments and analogies that invite curious readers to test ideas at home.

fields.name: Designing for Humans
fields.name_description: A practical primer on user-centered design with case studies and templates.
fields.description: Designing for Humans provides step-by-step templates and case studies to help teams create usable, inclusive products; written for practitioners and teams new to design thinking.

fields.name: Mapping the Mind
fields.name_description: An illustrated exploration of neuroscience discoveries and their real-world applications.
fields.description: Mapping the Mind pairs accessible summaries of cutting-edge neuroscience with clear diagrams, making complex ideas approachable to non-specialist readers interested in cognition and behaviour.

fields.name: The Business of Slow
fields.name_description: A critique of hustle culture and a manifesto for sustainable work practices.
fields.short_description: Essay collection on sustainable work and rest
fields.description: The Business of Slow argues for structurally sustainable rhythms in work and life, combining data, interviews and personal reflection to propose realistic alternatives to burnout culture.
